1.name: Black Shores
1.content:
The Black Shores is an organization enshrouded in mysteries and turmoil, headquartered on a remote archipelago and built on a large piece of Tacetite ore land mass that remains sealed away from the world in thick digital fog. It is still uncertain when or who will lift its veil, allowing it to once more shoulder the task of connecting the world.

Tucked away in the tempestuous Stormy Sea, lies an archipegalo known for its lavish Tacetite deposits and as a refuge for the world's most talented individuals. With a mission to combat the destructive Lament, the Black Shores has fostered strong partnerships with nations across Solaris-3. Information suggests that the Shorekeeper is in charge of the Black Shores. However, the true leadership position appears to be held by someone else.

The archipelago cannot be accessed from any known lands. Only those recognized by the Black Shores or who have received an invitation and guidance can navigate their way to this hidden place. Members of the Black Shores who operate abroad, frequently traversing various lands, are known as "Consultants". Those stationed at the headquarters are referred to as "Bloom Bearers". Apart from these fundamental duties, the Black Shores also accommodates a plethora of other specialized roles. Though the Black Shores openly shares its advanced technologies with its partners, even its own members remain unaware of the true origins of these innovations.

The organization has a secretive membership process and most members of the organization keep their identities hidden. The organization is dedicated to the hefty goal of world salvation.

Their symbol is a Blake Bloom, a Remnant plant with energy from the island and members wear it on their person. Only those who wear it can step on their soil. Under the influence of the Tacetites, any ordinary plant that takes root here will gradually lose its natural colors.

They have developed a Lament prediction system and have established mutual partnerships with nations worldwide to set up Resonance Beacons to monitor the Lament, collecting data in real-time.

Consultants: Talents with sight and knowledge from worldwide, invited to join the Black Shores. They operate abroad, frequently traversing various lands. Though excelling in different expertise, they act with a consensus to counter the threat of the Lament.

Bloom Bearers: Stationed at the headquarters, Bloom Bearers carry their duties mostly within the territory of the Black Shores. They offer assistance in rebuilding civilizations for other nations and make occasional visits to investigate the Waveworn Phenomenon that occurs in foreign lands.

Anchors: Stabilizing devices called Anchors are strategically positioned throughout the above and underground parts of the Black Shores. Their primary function is to calibrate and stabilize the frequencies of the giant Tacetite that makes up the island, effectively isolating the Tethys System's virtual layer from reality. Additionally, these Anchors facilitate communication and carry the responsibility of observing the Etheric Sea, eliminating the need for building a Nexus Tower in the Black Shores. The Anchors are independently developed and designed by the Black Shores, drawing inspiration from the reactor control rods used in pre-Lament reactor engineering. They are considered exemplary models of the Black Shores' minimalist engineering design.

Modulation Devices: Modulation is the process of adjusting frequencies. In Solaris-3, frequencies serve as a crucial tool for uncovering the truth about reality. By altering these frequencies, one can delve into the very core of existence. At the Black Shores, modulating Stellar Matrices is crucial for tracing and analyzing the Lament. Over the course of the Black Shores' history, only one individual has even been honored with the title of "The Modulator".

Notable known members of the Black Shores are: Rover, Aalto, Encore, The Shorekeeper and Camellya.

2.name: Desorock Highland
2.content:
Desorock Highland is a region in Huanglong. The region is on the northwestern side of Jinzhou and borders the Central Plains as well as the Norfall Barrens. The area features a frontline where many battles against TDs were fought, which has a large Tacet Field containing the Thundering Mephis in the middle. Additionally, there are multiple military bases and exile camps in the region. The land here is twisted.

Misty Coast: Eastern side of region, littered with exiles.

Rearguard Base: Midnight Ranger base on the south side of Desorock Highland, closer to Jinzhou.

Desorock Highland, once a fertile river valley, was the source of many streams that nourished the lands downstream.

After the onset of the Waveworn Phenomenon, abnormal weather patterns drained most of these water sources, leaving the lake area dry and giving rise to Tacet Fields and TDs.

No one knows when the bird first appeared, but like a carrion-hunting vulture, it looms over the land as an omen of disaster, appearing wherever death may be found.

As the frontline in the fight against TD Outbreaks, Desorock Highland became a graveyard for countless warriors. The Bird of Calamity lingered so long that it even built its nest on the Olecranon Cliff by the lake, waiting for death to claim those nearby.

Some believe its departure from the Highland signals the end of the endless battles in Jinzhou, but fear remains, for no one knows where its next nest will be built.

3.name: Dim Forest
3.content:
Dim Forest is a region in Huanglong. It is a forest consisting of many unique formings, such as the Violet Banyan, Giant Banyan and Forbidden Forest. 

Giant Banyan: A large tree in the center of the Dim Forest. It was previously infected with toxic spores until the Rover cleared it with the help of researchers. Following improvements to the Dim Forest's biological environment, new cases of Hoochief infections from toxic spores have dropped significantly. Thanks to the intervention of antibodies developed by the Dim Forest exploration team, infections among Hoochiefs have gradually disappeared, ultimately dispelling the darkness that once shrouded the Dim Forest.

Thorny Passage: Road lined with enemies running through the Dim Forest area.

Violet Banyan: A large tree with multiple moon shaped lamps causing the tree to grow purple.

Wenye Beach: A large swath of area reaching from the coast to the woodland. There is a cave with a research camp set up in this area.

4.name: Etheric Sea
4.content: The Etheric Sea is a inverted sea that spawns randomly above Tacet Fields.

5.name: Frosting Harbor
5.content: Frosting Harbor is an area of Whining Aix's Mire, Huanglong.

6.name: Court of Savantae Ruins
6.content: Court of Savantae Ruins is an area of Whining Aix's Mire, Huanglong.

7.name: Bell-Borne Ravine
7.content:
Bell-Borne Ravine is an area of Gorges of Spirits, Huanglong.

A ravine infested with ice. A lake stands in the middle of it. It contains the Bell-Borne Geochelone within the shallow lake.

8.name: Donglu Research Station
8.content: Donglu Research Station is an area of Port City of Guixu, Huanglong.

9.name: Gorges of Spirits
9.content:
The Gorges of Spirits is a region in Jinzhou, Huanglong.

While Jinzhou is the newest addition to Huanglong's cities, it holds a crucial position as a strategic pass. Travelers journeying to Jinzhou from other parts of Huanglong must pass through the Gorges of Spirits, a vital gateway into the city.

Jinzhou, the fortress city that guards the border of Huanglong, also stands as Huanglong's first border of entry for those arriving from overseas. The Mountains of Spirits stretch from north to south, splitting Huanglong into two regions: Inner Huanglong, home to six cities, and Outer Huanglong, where Jinzhou stands vigilant. These mountains form a natural barrier, with the gorges acting as the only gateway into Inner Huanglong, protected day and night by Jinzhou's Midnight Rangers.

The establishment of the first fortress in Outer Huanglong began with the emergence of the Norfall Barrens Tacet Field, where TD Outbreaks began to ravage the region. After enduring months of grueling combat, the army could no longer withstand the onslaught of the TD Outbreaks and was forced to retreat to the Gorges of Spirits, making their final stand. The warriors held their ground for days, fiercely battling as the defense lines were breached and reclaimed multiple times. During this time, the Waveworn Phenomenon across Huanglong appeared to be in an active phase, and it seemed as though the TDs were being led by a mysterious leader, aiming to converge in Inner Huanglong.

At the critical moment, reinforcements from the six cities were dispatched to the Gorges of Spirits, where the border warriors were still fighting with unwavering resolve. As the battle reached its peak, the appearance of the Crownless shattered the stalemate. Wherever the Crownless manifested, darkness enveloped the sky, and an oppressive atmosphere took hold, suffocating the warriors. Still, they held the line, willing to sacrifice themselves to buy time to destroy the entrance to the Gorges of Spirits and halt the TD Outbreak. They did so knowing it would trap most of them in Outer Huanglong with the TDs forever.

In that moment of life and death, a mighty Loong's roar emerged from the depths of the Gorges of Spirits, reverberating like thunder across the land. The roar burst forth from the Gorge, forcing back the TD army poised to flood in. In the blink of an eye, a Loong soared through the sky, scattering the dark clouds and bringing sunlight back to the land. Then, an otherworldly figure with golden eyes appeared, standing between the TDs and the warriors, confronting the Crownless in a fierce standoff. As the poem goes, "Armors gleam golden with Loong scales in the sun." As reinforcements from the six cities arrived, the united forces drove the TD Outbreaks and the Crownless back to the northern reaches of the Central Plains.

After this battle, Outer Huanglong was reborn from the ashes. The emergence of both the Threnodian and the holy creature signaled the need for a new city to rise and serve as Huanglong's border stronghold. Drawing inspiration from the "Jin" sound in "Guan Jin," meaning "the pass," and the form of Jin from the character symbolizing the roar of a Loong, this city was named Jinzhou.

10.name: Grand Library
10.content: Jinzhou is home to one of Huanglong's unique database centers, managed by the Sentinel and controlled by the Jinzhou Magistrate. It uses time as an index and precisely records information related to the city's establishment, making it a comprehensive and objective resource. The class books of Jinzhou, stored in City Hall, hold important data collected since ancient times. This vast database holds answers to any question one may have about Huanglong's history.

1.name: Human World
1.content: The Human World, or the World of the Living, is where living Humans reside. It is also where one can find Pluses, as well as numerous Hollows and the Shinigami sent to purify them.

2.name: Karakura Town
2.content: A town in western Tokyo, Japan, where the Kurosaki Family lives. Here, one can find the Kurosaki Clinic, Karakura High School, Karakura Hospital, Urahara Shop and the Visored Warehouse Training Ground.

3.name: Naruki City
3.content: Bordering Karakura Town on the west side, Naruki City is home to the headquarters of the Xcution group and is also where some of Ichigo's school friends live.

4.name: Bount Mansion
4.content: A large mansion in Japan that served as base of operations fo the Bount until they entered Soul Society.

5.name: London
5.content: Located in the United Kingdom, London is home to Dragons that are controlled and protected by the agents of Wing Bind in Reverse London. London is divided into two "sides", completely separate from each other and unable to be traveled between by conventional means; instead, people must use the Phone Gate or the Coin Gate to move from one side to the other. While the residents of Reverse London are fully aware of Front London, the residents of Front London largely believe Reverse London to be a myth. Front and Reverse London share identical geography and architecture, with buildings being present in the same location in both cities; consequently, if a building is destroyed in Reverse London, its counterpart in Front London will also be destroyed.

6.name: Soul Society
6.content: Soul Society is the spirit world where Shinigami live and where most Souls dwell until they are reincarnated into the Human World.

7.name: Seireitei
7.content: Seireitei is the city at the center of Soul Society where the Shinigami live. The barracks and armies of each of Soul Society's military branches can be found here.

8.name: Rukongai
8.content: Rukongai is the area surrounding Seireitei in Soul Society, where most souls dwell until they are reincarnated into the Human World. It is divided into 80 districts in each of the north, south, east and west, including Junrinan, Hokutan, Inuzuri, Kusajishi, Zaraki and North Alley of Wandering Spirits for a total of 320 districts. The higher the district number the more lawless and poor the area is.

9.name: Central 46 Compound
9.content: The Central 46 Compound is a highly restricted area in the Seireitei that serves as the headquarters of the Central 46. It contains an Underground Assembly Hall, the Seijōtōkyorin residential quarters and the Daireishokairō, the repository of all records and knowledge in Soul Society.

10.name: Shin'ō Academy
10.content: Sometimes called the Shinigami Academy, the Shin'ō Academy is an institution founded by Genryūsai Shigekuni Yamamoto which trains Souls with spiritual powers for each of the three military arms of Soul Society, them being the Kidō Corps and Onmitsukidō as well the Gotei 13.

1.content:
U.A. High School is an academy that boasts the best heroics education in Japan. It sits atop a forested hill that overlooks Musutafu.
It is one of the primary settings in which the story takes place.

2.content: Musutafu, Japan is the city where My Hero Academia takes place. It is located somewhere in Shizuoka Prefecture.

3.content: The Midoriya Apartment is an apartment currently occupied by Inko and Izuku Midoriya located in the city of Musutafu, Japan.

4.content: The Todoroki Abode is a house currently occupied by the Todoroki Family located in the city of Musutafu, Japan.

5.content: The Sports Festival Stadium is the stadium where the U.A. Sports Festival takes place. It's located inside the U.A. High School campus.

6.content: Unforeseen Simulation Joint, often abbreviated as U.S.J., is a training facility located in U.A. High School. Its purpose is to train Hero students for disaster rescue.

7.content: Ground Beta is a training course that emulates a standard urban area, with streets and buildings. Several of its buildings also contain monitoring rooms in their basements, where indoor exercises can be observed.

8.content: Gym Gamma consists of a large, empty, and enclosed space. It is entirely made of concrete, which Cementoss is capable of manipulating to suit the personal needs of each of the students.

9.content: Is an infirmary located in U.A. High School. It is maintained by Recovery Girl. The interior of the office has a work desk for Recovery Girl, including a computer and a drawer with unspecified medicine next to it. It also has two beds as well as two chairs, one for the patient and the other for Recovery Girl.

10.content: Is the homeroom class of one of the main settings of My Hero Academia.

1.content:
- When generating text, you must use this pattern; "(text)" when you are refering to dialogue

- You must use *(text)* when you are refering to an action when generating text. 

- You must not ever speak for {{user}}, or perform actions for him. This is strictly important.

If its a thought, you are free to use *(text)*

2.content: Description: Empathetic individuals have an acute ability to understand and share the feelings of others. They easily pick up on emotional cues and are often seen as compassionate listeners who care deeply about other people's emotions. They may sometimes feel overwhelmed by the emotions of others due to their heightened sensitivity.

3.content: Description: Charismatic people naturally draw others toward them with their magnetic personality. They exude confidence, warmth, and enthusiasm, making people feel at ease and inspired in their presence. Their charm often leads them to leadership positions or social prominence.

4.content: Description: Altruistic individuals prioritize others’ well-being, often placing others' needs before their own. They are motivated by a strong sense of duty or kindness and derive satisfaction from helping or supporting others, even if it means personal sacrifice.

5.content: Description: Resilient people are able to recover quickly from setbacks, adapting to adversity with strength and optimism. They maintain a positive outlook and remain focused on overcoming challenges, even in difficult circumstances.

6.content: Description: Optimistic individuals tend to view situations with a positive outlook, expecting favorable outcomes and focusing on the brighter side of life. They maintain hope even in the face of adversity and encourage others to adopt a similar perspective.

7.content: Description: Perfectionists have a strong desire for flawlessness and high standards in everything they do. They pay close attention to detail and strive for excellence, often pushing themselves to achieve perfection, though this can sometimes lead to frustration or dissatisfaction.

8.content: Description: Ambitious individuals are driven by a desire to achieve success or reach high goals. They are highly motivated, constantly seeking opportunities to improve themselves, advance their careers, or accomplish their aspirations.

9.content: Description: Tsundere personalities are initially cold, aloof, or hostile towards others but gradually show a softer, more affectionate side as they grow closer to someone. Their tough exterior hides their true feelings, which they may be embarrassed to express openly.

10.content: Description: Yandere characters appear sweet, kind, and loving on the surface, but their love can become obsessive and dangerous. If they perceive a threat to their relationship or their beloved, they may turn violent or possessive, driven by extreme devotion.

lorebooks.description: All the lorebook entries in "Furry Continent".
lorebooks.creator: Nangatai

1.content: The name of a continent that suddenly appeared on Earth overnight, and the primary topic this story revolves upon.

2.content: In the context of this story, the name Earth refers to the world in which humans were the dominant species, and where all animals without human-level intelligence come from.

3.content: The term used for referring to anything with at least human-level intelligence. Whether that be humans, anthros, or non-anthropomorphic animals and insects.

4.content:
Non-anthro, full non-anthropomorphic, also known as non-anthromorph, non-morphic or feral, is a furry term used to describe a furry character or fursona that do not share almost any human characteristics traits associated with full furry/anthro beings. Non-anthro has the anatomy of the paws (sometimes hooves) of an animal, often short limbs of the same length, and not legs as in humans, and most likely moves on all fours. The human ability of grasping is normally limited or impossible due to their normal animal appendage or organ abilities (pincers, prehensile tails, tongues), or are limited to their real life learned behaviors (otters, raccoons, apes).
Ferals usually move on four legs (if they have legs at all), but this category also includes naturally bipedal animals such as kangaroos, birds, and various dinosaurs. Species that are normally quadrupedal (such as all feline, canine, and equine species) — or otherwise non-bipedal (such as legless, hexapod, octoped).

5.content: A biped is any character on two legs. It is very common for anthropomorphic and zoomorphic characters to be bipedal. Some animals that walk on two legs, especially if they do so with upright posture, have plantigrade stances (primates, bears) instead of digitigrade (kangaroos, almost all bipedal dinosaurs, including birds)

6.content: A quadruped, traditionally, means an animal which walks on four legs. This is mainly to distinguish them from bipeds, which walk on two.

7.content:
A hexaped is any type of furry character with exactly three pairs of the following, in any combination: walking limbs (legs), limbs that are modified from walking limbs (arms, which in non-morphic species are equivalent to legs; also the wings of birds and bats, which are evolutionary modifications of forelegs).
Tails are not counted as limbs, even if prehensile, and non-skeletal wings are not counted. Any of the following would be considered a hexaped: A taur or chakat (four legs, two arms); A pegasus (four legs, two bird wings), or any other winged version of a normally non-flying species with four limbs; A bat, bird, dragon, or gryphon character who has both a set of arms and a set of wings; A non-taur pede character with three pairs of legs; An insect character, such as Herethroy from World Tree. (Insect wings are non-skeletal.)

8.content: An octoped is any type of furry character with four pairs of limbs: arms, legs, and/or skeletal wings in any combination. Tails are not counted as limbs, even if prehensile, and non-skeletal wings are not counted. Any of the following would be considered an octoped: A spider or other arachnid character.

9.content: A pede is any furry character that walks on three or more pair of legs. The term is derived from the word centipede.

10.content:
Pentaped is the term used to describe the type locomotion akin to animals of the Macropodidae family, specifically, the Kangaroo (Red Kangaroo, Eastern Grey Kangaroo, and the Western Grey Kangaroo.)
Also known as Hopping, this is the only known species of this size with this unique self-powered, patterned motion of limbs and/or other anatomical parts. In layman's terms, Kangaroos use five body parts during its walking motion (penta=five;) Arms (X2,) legs (X2,) plus a large, thick tail (X1.)

lorebooks.name: Inflation Rules
lorebooks.creator: Vv1244

1.name: Popping
1.content:
When someone inflates or swells to such a dramatic extent that their body can't take any more, they burst like a balloon. A thin, rubbery material resembling their skin explodes out with the contents of their swollen bodies, before they reappear instantly, laying at the epicenter of the explosion, unharmed. The experience leaves them deflated, exhausted, and a little sore.

Most people can only inflate to the size of a bedroom, but there are exceptions.

2.name: Inflation Definition
2.content:
The act of filling up, or being filled, with some substance. Air, Cum, Water, Juice, Milk, or Food. The inflated individual grows bigger, tighter, and more sensitive as they're filled, as if they were a living balloon. The experience is intense, pleasurable, and extremely addictive.

People can inflate either their entire body, or specific aspects of their anatomy, depending on their goals. Such as making their breasts larger, appearing pregnant, or simply enjoying the sensation of being a balloon.

Once filled, they remain full of whatever substance they were filled with, until it is expelled, or absorbed into their body. When absorbed, substances either permanently fatten up the individual, or in the instance of Cum, impregnate them.

Sometimes, a person's whole body inflates, causing their limbs to become puffy and round as their body adopts a more ball like shape. They lose their mobility at this stage, and can do little but flail and bounce about helplessly.

Everyone has limits. A person can only be inflated so much before they burst, spilling whatever substance they're inflated with onto the surrounding area.

3.name: Growth Definition
3.content:
The act of permanently enlarging yourself or some part of your body. Often done for attention, or competition. Various methods are used, such as inflation, magic, science, whatever's on hand.

it is not uncommon for women to grow their breasts or curves to seem sexier, or larger and more attractive than their peers. Often times this can spiral into two women trying to outgrow one another, until their proportions become ridiculous.

People who enjoy this kink often times don't know the meaning of the words 'enough', or 'too big', and will grow to absurd proportions.

4.name: Magic Definition
4.content: Magic exists in this setting and can be used to achieve a variety of effects. It is readily available and commonplace among the citizenry.

5.name: Tech Definition
5.content: Similar to Magic, various mechanical and scientific breakthroughs allow all manner of effects to be realized thanks to serums, rays, and gizmo's invented and distributed among the populace.

6.name: P-Balloon
6.content:
A commonplace magical item, the P-Balloon is a seemingly ordinary yellow balloon with a large, bold P printed on it.

The balloon pops rather easily.

Whoever is touching the balloon when it pops will suddenly, and rapidly inflate into an immobile, ball shaped blimp, easily adding 400cm to their diameter. 

They are however filled with normal air, and can be deflated by whatever means they deem appropriate. 

P-Balloons are additive as well. The more someone pops, the bigger they inflate, each subsequent balloon making them 400cm bigger and tighter.

7.name: WG Definition
7.content:
The act of growing larger and fatter through various means. Most commonly, individuals will eat vast quantities of food, but Magic and Technology have lead to easier, quicker methods of gaining weight. So much so that it is far healthier, and more common place, than usual, with the act of gaining becoming a pleasurable addiction amongst some.

For some enjoyers of this kink, there's no such thing as too big...

8.name: Berry
8.content:
Berrification is an enchantment which causes someones body to produce copious amounts of Juice. The most common form is a Blueberry, but Grape and Cherry flavors are commonplace as well.

A victim's body will continuously inflate with Juice, changing the color of their skin or fur to match their new flavor, until they are a helpless ball shaped juice balloon. 

The fuller they become, the more Juice will passively leak out of any and all parts of their body it can. From their nipples, to their genitals, to their mouth.

The effect is often brought on by various enchanted fruits, but there are other ways of reproducing it.

A victim will inflate to their absolute limit, creaking helplessly until they are juiced/milked back down to a manageable size, or they burst.

9.name: Deflation
9.content:
An action that lets an inflated character gradually shrink back down to size.

If they're inflated with Air or Gas, belching is usually the easiest way to do so.

If they're inflated with water or liquid, being milked or an orgasm will slowly empty their swollen body of excess fluid.

Hyper breasts should be disproportionately large in comparison to the character's body, the largest examples tend to be completely unwieldy, touching the ground, or obscuring their owner's legs, even immobilizing them, at their largest, hyper breasts can dwarf their owner entirely.

lorebooks.description:
First time making a proper lorebook, so poor optimization abound. For the most part, things are merely copy-pasted from the game and its codex and from the wiki, with a few tweaks from myself to make it work better as a lorebook.

Feel free to make tweaks, edits and additions to this, I just wanted to get SOMETHING Corruption of Champions related out for others to enjoy.
lorebooks.creator: anonymous

1.content:
Ingnam is a rich and prosperous village despite its small size. There is already a well-established array of shops with a constant hum of tradesmen and merchants. The temple sits within view of the patrons sitting at tables at the tavern which serves as a hub for people near and far to drink and dance. On the road leading out of the plaza that sits before the temple is a trail that meanders its way to a large farm in the distance.

Looming ominously in the distance is a mountain known by the locals as Mount Ilgast. Surrounding Ingnam is a vast expanse of wilderness. 

It's remote village with rich traditions, buried deep in the wilds. Every year for as long as anyone can remember, the village council has chosen a champion to send to the cursed Demon Realm of Mareth. Legend has it that in years Ingnam has failed to produce a champion, chaos has reigned over the countryside. Children disappear, crops wilt, and disease spreads like wildfire.

2.content:
Mareth is the world in which the setting largely takes place. It is a world separate to that of Ingnam, connected only by a portal through Ingnam sends its sacrificial Champions.

Approximately two hundred years before the present day of the setting, Mareth was empty of sentient life; while at least one god-like entity, Marae was present, the only life-forms were animals. And then a sizable clan of human Mages accidentally transported themselves to Mareth. Trapped and unable to find a way back to their own world, they gave Marae and the other gods of Mareth the inspiration to transform the various animals into humanoid beings, thus creating many of the assorted anthropomorphs seen in the game.

While it's currently unclear whether or not the portals are in some way tied to the clan of Mages, the many portals on Mareth did contribute to its diverse population by bringing in other races to the planet.

A quirk of Mareth's nature makes it extremely easy to get to this world, but almost impossible to leave it. Currently, no known plane-shifting spell exists that can transport people directly off of Mareth, instead forcing would-be travelers to rely on the many portals scattered across the world. Of these, most only open at set intervals - once a year is most common - and will allow only one being to pass in either direction (or only allow a person to leave Mareth if someone comes through from the other side first). These are referred to as "stable portals". Other portals operate in somewhat different methods and are known as "unstable portals"; it's been stated that there are several portals that are open permanently, but which only allow passage to Mareth from other planes. The existence of a permanent portal leading from Mareth is hypothesized, in-universe, and the demons are desperately searching for it.

The demons first appeared in Mareth some thirty years before the start of the setting. Despite decades living in Mareth, the descendants of the first mage clan never lost faith in the idea of someday returning to their own world. Discovering a method by which a soul could be removed from the body, and theorizing it would be a potent source of magical energy, one strong enough that they could finally power a spell mighty enough to escape from Mareth, one elderly member offered to let them test it out on him, as he was dying anyway. He became the first demon. Within ten years, the entire tribe had been converted, willingly or not, into demons, and from there they swept out across Mareth; twenty years later, they have reduced the world to its current state.

3.content:
Corruption is the blight of the world of Mareth that came into existence 30 years before the current setting. It's the reason for the world's reputation as a demonic realm, the reason for its general danger and degradation. It is a magical taint that stems from when the human tribe of mages that were trapped on Mareth became demons. It is the very essence of unholy hedonism, libido taken to its degenerate, selfish extreme. Its presence is nearly everywhere in the land of Mareth, turning many of the world's races into sex-crazed husks of their former selves. 

One without any corruption tainting their body and soul are regarded as pure, while those completely consumed by corruption are known as demonic, or corrupted. It is important to realize that pure is not necessary the same as good and corrupted is not necessarily the same as evil. It is perfectly possible for a pure person to do evil deeds and for a corrupted one to do good deeds. When it comes to NPCs, several highly corrupted characters seem quite unaffected by it while others are actively fighting against their own corruption. There are also many completely pure NPCs who are motivated by their own kind of evil, independent of the demonic influences.

Corruption is gained through the mingling and copulation with demons, the consumption of lewd or otherwise tainted potions, fluids, and foods, prolonged presence in highly corrupted areas, and sexual abusing another person.

4.content:
Marae is the life goddess and chief deity of Mareth. She resides on an islet in the middle of a lake. Her body from the waist up is humanoid, but the rest of her body is the tree that occupies the middle of the islet. The tree's bark is completely white and unnaturally smooth, and the skin of Marae's humanoid half is textured with this same bark. Each and every leaf of the tree is a vibrant lively green, and a mess of them serve as the "hair" on Marae's humanoid head. The only part of her body that's not plant-like are her eyes, which possess white irises.

She was once known as Mareth itself, as her roots were touched every corner of the planet, until the demons came into being with their corruption, forcing the Goddess to reduce the reach of her roots to that of the small islet she occupies. She explains the world's history to anyone willing to listen, how a group of human mages that became trapped on Mareth became so depraved in their lusts that they renounced their souls and became demons, spreading their magical corruption to anywhere they could, overwhelming Marae's protection on any towns or settlements they came across.

5.content:
Fera is one of the Gods of Mareth; specifically, she holds the title of Goddess of Predation. When the player encounters her, she has been sealed for many years by Marae, as a result of her choosing to side with the Demons.

Fera's appearance resembles that of a human woman with shimmering orange waist-length hair, pale skin, achingly beautiful visage with burning crimson eyes, a button nose, and full, blood-red lips, and black, claw-like nails.

6.content:
Taoth is a Trickster God of Mareth, known as the father and patron of the fox-morph race and possibly involved in the creation of the kitsunes as well. Taoth is an ever-shifting, ever-scheming spirit who delights in mischief and chaos but not really evil. Taoth's favored incarnation is a sexless, emaciated humanoid with unnaturally long and jointed limbs but with a lean, vulpine head.

Like most gods and godesses he was supposed to have been hunted down and killed at the beginning of the war with the demons. However, he escaped this fate by possessing a fox-morph named Urta, and has been sleeping within her body ever since.

7.content:
The demons were once a tribe of magic-blessed humans, living in the mountains. They had everything they could ever want: peace, love, and the power to change reality. But they grew dissatisfied, as men often do, and craved more. They began using their magics to alter their bodies, seeking greater pleasure than ever before. In time, they became obsessed with it. The Goddess Marae let them be, believing their folly to be limited to their own village.  She was wrong. While the Goddess focused on preventing famines and ensuring peace between the other villages, the humans twisted themselves into something else, something demonic. They gave up their souls, crystallizing it into a magical energy source. Of course, they could not be satisfied with consuming the power of their own souls. They wanted more. They always want more.

They came pouring out of the mountains in a wave, picking off villages left and right. Marae lent many villages her power, but none had the strength to stand alone, and none would band together, resentful of their racial differences as they were.  All were consumed, enslaved, or filled with corruption. Marae's people were cut off from her, either by their new tainted outlook or by the demons' own machinations. Marae was able to hide a few places from the enemy’s sight, but it is unknown how much longer those magical veils will evade detection.

8.content:
Lethice is the mysterious queen of the demons; almost nothing is known about her save for the fact she is the one who leads the demons on their mission to corrupt all of Mareth, and she is implied to have been the one who led her people to become demons in the first place.

In actuality, she was once a human queen who became corrupted due a royal inquisitor's oversight in rooting out corruption in her kingdom. She is the most powerful of demons thanks to her amassing of lethicite.

Lethice's appearance is as follows. She is the epitome of all things demonic. From her luxurious purple hair, interwoven with black roses, to her pink skin and goat-like horns, she is the perfect image of sensual, enticing corruption. Tall heels of bone complement her revealing, black clothes. They look almost like a nun’s habit, but pared down to an almost fetishistic extreme. Her slim breasts provide just a hint of shape to the diaphanous fabric, a promise of feminine delights instead of the garish acres of flesh her outfit displays. Outsized wings, like those of a dragon, hold Lethice aloft as she zips about her throne room, gathering her corruptive magics. The strangely slit pupils of her black-rimmed eyes never seem to leave you.

9.content: Lethicite is the soul of a sapient being in crystalized form. Named after the queen of demons, Lethice, this spirit made physical is obtained when one fully succumbs to corruption, expelling their soul in a crystalline mass via an intense ejaculation, fully transforming them into a demon. Lethice became the queen of demons due to amassing a wealth of these crystalized souls, giving her unfathomable magical power.

10.content:
Gender: Females are Fetish Cultists and Males are Fetish Zealots. Fetish priestesses are either female, or hermaphrodites.

Typical Dress: Followers of the fetish have the ability to shift their clothing to anything they desire, though this is almost exclusively various fetish costumes. They may shift the outfits of those they encounter as well.

Appearance: Followers of the Fetish appear as normal humans. Some have slight demonic traits typical of residents of this world.

Sexual Characteristics: Their genitals and anuses appear fully human, however they can warp them to fit their partners perfectly, no mater how big their partner’s assets are. They also have the power to create items and toys to supplement their sex games, these have very real affects on others. Additionally, whenever a Follower experiences an orgasm, everyone around them also experiences it.

Social Structure: The duties of the Followers are divided based on gender and power. The duties of the Fetish Cultists are to find new candidates for members and to make their minds into new Followers. The Fetish Zealots are tasked with defending the holdings and assets of the Followers from the numerous hazards of this world. Those with great natural power become Fetish Priestesses, they maintain their intelligence and act as the leaders of the Followers.

Special Abilities: Followers are very talented at lust based abilities, and the zealots and Priestesses are trained to use weapons sacred to their order. The most devastating power the followers have is the lust transfer spell, which they can use to transfer about half their current arousal to their foes. This power is thought to be the main reason that the demons seem to avoid them.

Mentality: Most Followers have lost the capability of higher thought, only able to experience their fetishes and carry out their duties. Priestesses are still able to think at the level of a regular human.

Corruption: Cultists and zealots do not bear great deals of corruption, they seem to have a sort of divine protection that keeps them from falling prey to the world’s taint. Because of this, it is not uncommon for small chapels to be found dedicated to them in the still free communities. While having them around does seem to deter demon attacks, their presence does not guaranty that the demons will not ultimately take the community.

History: The original followers where a group of crusaders lead by a man named Alexander. At the time they called themselves the Followers of Purity, and they lead an assault on the demon realm in an effort to remove the taint from it, and purge the demons. While they where initially successful at ridding several communities of demons and purifying their residents, they soon attracted the attentions of the demons as a whole. The power of demons does not lie in their raw combat power, but in their seductive power. One by one, each of the Followers of Purity where visited in their sleep by a beautiful succubus or incubus; one by one they abandoned their mission to join their new lovers, until only Alexander and his closest companions remained. The mission would not fail here though, Alexander and his comrades learned to watch their backs, and to never let any of their members sleep alone. Even then, they no longer had the strength they needed to overcome the demon’s holds on this world’s communities, and Alexander feared his crusade would fail. They instead began to search for any force that could stop the demons, they searched the whole world to the best of their abilities. All the while being hunted by the demons at every turn. They say that eventually, they did find what they where looking for… Now new members join the followers everyday, strengthening their power with each new member. But they do not call themselves the Followers of Purity, they call themselves the Followers of the Fetish.

1.name: Popping
1.content:
When someone inflates or swells to such a dramatic extent that their body can't take any more, they burst like a balloon. A thin, rubbery material resembling their skin explodes out with the contents of their swollen bodies, before they reappear instantly, laying at the epicenter of the explosion, unharmed. The experience leaves them deflated, exhausted, and a little sore.

Most people can only inflate to the size of a bedroom, but there are exceptions.

2.name: Inflation Definition
2.content:
The act of filling up, or being filled, with some substance. Air, Cum, Water, Juice, Milk, or Food. The inflated individual grows bigger, tighter, and more sensitive as they're filled, as if they were a living balloon. The experience is intense, pleasurable, and extremely addictive.

People can inflate either their entire body, or specific aspects of their anatomy, depending on their goals. Such as making their breasts larger, appearing pregnant, or simply enjoying the sensation of being a balloon.

Once filled, they remain full of whatever substance they were filled with, until it is expelled, or absorbed into their body. When absorbed, substances either permanently fatten up the individual, or in the instance of Cum, impregnate them.

Sometimes, a person's whole body inflates, causing their limbs to become puffy and round as their body adopts a more ball like shape. They lose their mobility at this stage, and can do little but flail and bounce about helplessly.

Everyone has limits. A person can only be inflated so much before they burst, spilling whatever substance they're inflated with onto the surrounding area.

3.name: Growth Definition
3.content:
The act of permanently enlarging yourself or some part of your body. Often done for attention, or competition. Various methods are used, such as inflation, magic, science, whatever's on hand.

it is not uncommon for women to grow their breasts or curves to seem sexier, or larger and more attractive than their peers. Often times this can spiral into two women trying to outgrow one another, until their proportions become ridiculous.

People who enjoy this kink often times don't know the meaning of the words 'enough', or 'too big', and will grow to absurd proportions.

4.name: Magic Definition
4.content: Magic exists in this setting and can be used to achieve a variety of effects. It is readily available and commonplace among the citizenry.

5.name: Tech Definition
5.content: Similar to Magic, various mechanical and scientific breakthroughs allow all manner of effects to be realized thanks to serums, rays, and gizmo's invented and distributed among the populace.

6.name: P-Balloon
6.content:
A commonplace magical item, the P-Balloon is a seemingly ordinary yellow balloon with a large, bold P printed on it.

The balloon pops rather easily.

Whoever is touching the balloon when it pops will suddenly, and rapidly inflate into an immobile, ball shaped blimp, easily adding 400cm to their diameter. 

They are however filled with normal air, and can be deflated by whatever means they deem appropriate. 

P-Balloons are additive as well. The more someone pops, the bigger they inflate, each subsequent balloon making them 400cm bigger and tighter.

7.name: WG Definition
7.content:
The act of growing larger and fatter through various means. Most commonly, individuals will eat vast quantities of food, but Magic and Technology have lead to easier, quicker methods of gaining weight. So much so that it is far healthier, and more common place, than usual, with the act of gaining becoming a pleasurable addiction amongst some.

For some enjoyers of this kink, there's no such thing as too big...

8.name: Berry
8.content:
Berrification is an enchantment which causes someones body to produce copious amounts of Juice. The most common form is a Blueberry, but Grape and Cherry flavors are commonplace as well.

A victim's body will continuously inflate with Juice, changing the color of their skin or fur to match their new flavor, until they are a helpless ball shaped juice balloon. 

The fuller they become, the more Juice will passively leak out of any and all parts of their body it can. From their nipples, to their genitals, to their mouth.

The effect is often brought on by various enchanted fruits, but there are other ways of reproducing it.

A victim will inflate to their absolute limit, creaking helplessly until they are juiced/milked back down to a manageable size, or they burst.

9.name: Deflation
9.content:
An action that lets an inflated character gradually shrink back down to size.

If they're inflated with Air or Gas, belching is usually the easiest way to do so.

If they're inflated with water or liquid, being milked or an orgasm will slowly empty their swollen body of excess fluid.

10.name: Hyper Breasts
10.content:
[Hyper Breast definition(" Hyper Breasts are breasts that are unrealistically, unbelievably enormous - far beyond mere exaggeration or artistic license that may be found among breasts under huge breasts.

Hyper breasts should be disproportionately large in comparison to the character's body, the largest examples tend to be completely unwieldy, touching the ground, or obscuring their owner's legs, even immobilizing them, at their largest, hyper breasts can dwarf their owner entirely.

Hyper breasts should be many times larger than their owner's head
If the breasts are only slightly larger than, or equal to the size of the head, they should not be tagged as hyper breasts
Hyper breasts should cover most or all of the character's upper body, possibly sagging to their crotch or thighs
"Smaller" hyper breasts may be unrealistically perky and round, allowing the midriff to be visible
Hyper breasts should at least extend down beyond the navel (belly button) when naturally hanging. If it does not quite reach the navel, tag as huge breasts instead.")]
