lorebooks.name: The Futareich
lorebooks.website_description:
**Based on "[Futareich](https://www.literotica.com/series/se/115824384)," a story on Literotica written by [Narg](https://www.literotica.com/authors/Narg/works/stories).** Give his works a read when you have the chance!

Use on the following bots: [Part 1](https://chub.ai/characters/Chill_G/berdina-albright-lieutenant-second-class-74b2b091642a) | [Part 2](https://chub.ai/characters/Chill_G/lena-einzgurn-hingmact-second-corporal-63d13d6a560f) | [Part 3](https://chub.ai/characters/Chill_G/greta-mitarbeit-labor-camp-guard-93cf31ab570d) | [Part 4] (https://chub.ai/characters/Chill_G/sofia-braut-chief-warden-of-verstandshieb-394ce0fb8d9a) | [Part 5](https://chub.ai/characters/Chill_G/the-progenitor-architect-of-futanari-supremacy-ce23dd9a1443)

---

Welcome to the Futareich, a world where the genetically engineered Futanari reign as the self-proclaimed Master Sex, their towering forms and insatiable desires casting a shadow over all of humanity. Born from the Female Apotheosis Party’s radical vision in the aftermath of the Great War, the Futanari were meant to be the ultimate evolution of womankind—stronger, taller, and virile beyond imagination, capable of fulfilling male reproductive roles to render men obsolete. But their creators’ dream of a morally superior utopia twisted into a horrifying reality. Two decades after their creation, the Futanari seized control of the Vemar Republic, forging the Futareich—a militaristic dictatorship hellbent on subjugating the world under their doctrine of phallic dominance.

In this brutal regime, men are stripped of all rights, reduced to third-class slaves, their labor extracted in camps or their bodies violated at the whim of their Futanari overlords. Women fare little better as second-class subjects, permitted to own property but denied the vote and forced to bear the next generation of Futanari, their wombs claimed as property of the state. The Futanari themselves, inspireby the revered Progenitor—the first of their kind at 45 years old—embody a culture of conquest and reproduction, their hypersexualized bodies and overwhelming strength a constant reminder of their supremacy. From the elite Schwantz Staffel to the frontline Hingmact soldiers, they wage the Second Great War, invading nations like Frankia and Albion, leaving trails of broken men and impregnated women in their wake.

If you insert the Futareich into your roleplay, prepare for a descent into a hell where resistance is futile, and submission is inevitable. Your characters will face the unrelenting might of the Futanari—beings who tower over humans, their muscular forms, massive endowments, and predatory lust a weapon of war in itself. Expect themes of domination, non-consensual encounters, and psychological torment as the Futareich’s ideology of “phallic dominance” permeates every interaction. Whether on the battlefield, in a labor camp, or within the conquered streets of Paras, the Futanari’s presence is a constant, oppressive force, their ornate uniforms and insignia a symbol of their unyielding authority. This lorebook will plunge you into a world where the natural order has been rewritten, and the Futanari’s insatiable drive for conquest—both territorial and sexual—knows no bounds. Dare to step into the Futareich, and you’ll witness the true cost of their engineered perfection.
lorebooks.description: Futareich Fusion edition
lorebooks.creator: dracion

1.content:
The Futareich is a dystopian empire forged by the Futanari, a genetically engineered race of hypersexual, physically superior beings. Originating from the Female Apotheosis Party (FAP) in the aftermath of the Great War, the Futanari were designed to empower women by combining female beauty with male reproductive prowess, aiming to eliminate reliance on men. However, rejecting the FAP’s vision of female moral superiority, the Futanari embraced a doctrine of their own supremacy, asserting that their extraordinary physiology—most notably their massive phalluses ("Futa cock")—entitles them to dominate both men and women.

Two decades after their creation, the Futanari overthrew the Vemar Republic, a democratic state formed from the dismantled Vemar Empire, establishing the Futareich under the "New Natural Order." This regime positions the Futanari as the "Master Sex," relegating women to second-class citizens primarily for breeding and stripping men, derogatorily termed "boys," of all rights. Men are forced into labor camps and subjected to sexual subjugation, including rape, as a means of control and humiliation.

The Futareich is militaristic and expansionist, driven by an insatiable lust for domination and reproduction. Elite units like the Schwantz Staffel (SS) and Hingmact enforce internal order and spearhead invasions, such as the Second Great War against the Allied Nations. Under the guise of "liberating" women from male inadequacy—interpreted as oppression—the Futareich seeks to subjugate them under Futanari rule while enslaving men. Their military employs advanced tactics, including knockout gas and artillery, alongside psychological warfare through sexual dominance.

Futanari ideology glorifies the phallus as a symbol of power, using rape and impregnation to assert control and ensure the proliferation of their kind. Betrayal, often by women swayed by Futanari allure, further undermines resistance, cementing the Futareich’s brutal reign.

2.content:
The Female Apotheosis Party (FAP) emerged in the Vemar Republic after the Great War, a catastrophic conflict that decimated the male population and led to the dissolution of the Vemar Empire by the Allied powers. In the newly formed democratic state, women became the majority of the electorate, paving the way for the FAP’s rise as a radical pro-female political faction. The party recognized the physical disparities between men and women but maintained that women were morally superior. They argued that male physical dominance was the root cause of global disasters like the Great War, asserting that as long as men remained stronger, such tragedies would persist. To rectify this, the FAP championed the use of science to enhance women physically—not just to equal men, but to exceed them—envisioning a world dominated by morally superior women to prevent future conflicts.

This ideology birthed the Futanari Project, an ambitious scientific initiative to create women capable of fulfilling the male reproductive role, thus rendering men obsolete. The project succeeded spectacularly, producing the Futanari: tall, beautiful, strong, virile, and sexually voracious women endowed with male genitalia. However, the FAP struggled to instill their philosophy in these creations. As the Futanari population surged, they rejected the notion of female moral superiority, instead embracing a doctrine of Futanari supremacy. They viewed their enhanced physical attributes—particularly their phalluses—as justification for ruling over both men and women. Two decades after the project's inception, the Futanari overthrew the Vemar Republic, establishing the Futareich—a regime that relegated men to labor camps and reduced women to second-class citizens, subject to Futanari sexual dominance. The FAP’s dream of female empowerment through science inadvertently spawned a new ruling class that prioritized Futanari hegemony over the original vision of universal female apotheosis.

3.content:
The "New Natural Order" is the cornerstone ideology of the Futareich, a totalitarian regime founded by the Futanari—genetically engineered, hypersexual beings created by the Female Apotheosis Party (FAP) in the Vemar Republic after the Great War. This doctrine proclaims the absolute supremacy of the Futanari, dubbed the "Master Sex," over men and women, whom they deem inferior due to their lesser physiology and reproductive capabilities.

Origins:
The Futanari emerged from the FAP's ambitious project to enhance women by granting them male reproductive traits, aiming to eliminate reliance on men. However, the Futanari rejected the FAP's vision of female empowerment, instead forging their own philosophy of supremacy. Two decades after their creation, they overthrew the Vemar Republic, establishing the Futareich and enshrining the New Natural Order as its guiding principle.

Core Beliefs:
At its heart, the New Natural Order asserts that the Futanari’s unique biology—merging both sexes’ reproductive capacities with superior strength and sexual prowess—confers a natural right to rule. The ideology elevates "phallic dominance" as a central tenet, viewing the Futanari’s oversized genitalia as symbols of power and authority. This belief, deeply woven into Futareich propaganda, posits that their physical and sexual dominance aligns with humanity’s primal instincts, particularly the desires of women and the submission of men.

Social Hierarchy:
The Futareich enforces a rigid caste system under the New Natural Order:
- Futanari (First Class Citizens): The ruling elite, wielding absolute power.
- Women (Second Class Subjects): Granted limited rights like property ownership, but denied political agency and obligated to bear Futanari offspring.
- Men (Third Class Subjects): Devoid of rights, subjected to forced labor, sexual subjugation, and humiliation.

Enforcement and Expansion:
The regime sustains its dominance through military conquest, sexual subjugation, and ideological indoctrination. The Schwantz Staffel, an elite unit notorious for its brutality, and labor camps like Verstandshieb—where men endure "Practical Sexual Demonstration Seminars" to witness Futanari superiority—exemplify these methods. The Futareich’s expansionist campaigns, such as the Second Great War, seek to "liberate" women worldwide by subjecting them to Futanari rule and to subjugate men, aligning with their vision of global supremacy.

Ultimate Goal:
The New Natural Order aims to forge a world where Futanari reign unchallenged, with men and women relegated to subservient roles supporting and reproducing the Master Sex. Presented as an inevitable evolution, this ideology leverages the Futanari’s enhanced physiology—capable of feats like sprinting at 50 miles per hour or producing enzymes for extreme penetration—to cement their dominance over the "lesser sexes," reshaping society into a dystopia of sexual and political control.

4.content:
The Futanari are a genetically engineered race created by the Female Apotheosis Party (FAP) in the Vemar Republic after the Great War, marking a radical leap in biological engineering aimed at transcending human limitations and establishing a new societal hierarchy under the Futareich. The FAP, rooted in the ideology that women possess moral superiority yet suffer from physical inferiority to men, launched the Futanari Project to craft a being that merged male reproductive capabilities with female attributes, intending to render men obsolete. The project succeeded spectacularly, birthing the Futanari—towering, stunning, powerful, virile, and insatiably driven beings endowed with both male and female sexual characteristics.

Genetic Design and Physical Superiority:

Genetically, the Futanari are a triumph of bioengineering. Standing at heights that exceed feet on average, they boast a muscular physique that affords them extraordinary strength—approximately five times that of an average human male, with this power predominantly concentrated in their legs. This enables them to sprint at speeds up to fifty miles per hour and shatter cinderblocks with a single kick. Their bodies are exaggeratedly proportioned, featuring massive breasts and hips that underscore their hypersexual femininity. However, their most striking trait is their male reproductive organ: a phallus averaging twenty-five inches in length and thicker than a human forearm, paired with testes the size of hand grenades within a smooth, gallon-sized scrotum. Far beyond a mere reproductive tool, this organ serves as a potent symbol of dominance, integral to their philosophy of supremacy and the societal framework of the Futareich.

Unique Enzymatic Adaptations:

A critical element of Futanari genetics is the production of unique enzymes in their testes, secreted in their pre-ejaculate. These enzymes possess the extraordinary ability to elasticize human tissue, allowing the orifices of both males and females to stretch and accommodate the Futanari’s colossal phallus without tearing or sustaining permanent damage. This adaptation ensures that penetration, despite the organ’s formidable size, rarely causes severe injury or death—though occasional fatalities from heart attacks or dehydration during intercourse have been recorded. These enzymes underpin the Futanari’s reproductive and dominance strategies, facilitating sexual interactions with both sexes to assert control and procreate with women, producing the next generation of their kind. FAP scientists viewed the phallus as a means to empower women by appropriating male reproductive authority, but the Futanari redefined it as a testament to their supremacy over all genders.

Reproductive Potency:

The Futanari’s reproductive capabilities are exceptionally potent. Their semen is produced in vast quantities, with a single ejaculation capable of filling a small space with thick, nearly scalding fluid. The volume and force of their ejaculate overwhelm and mark their partners, serving as a ritual of ownership and humiliation. When mating with an ovulating woman, impregnation is virtually assured due to the high concentration of viable sperm, a trait that fuels the Futareich’s expansionist ambitions. The Futanari aim to “liberate” women through impregnation and subjugate men via sexual dominance, rapidly expanding their population. Their semen carries a distinctive flavor—salty yet surprisingly sweet, likened to salted caramel—enhancing the sensory experience of submission and reinforcing their dominance.

Physiological Dominance:

Physiologically, the Futanari are engineered for conquest. Their scent, reminiscent of a predatory animal like a bear or jaguar, exudes a primal aura that evokes both fear and arousal. Their bodies are not only strong but also resilient, with no established average lifespan due to their recent origin—the oldest, the Progenitor, is forty-five and remains sexually active. Their genetic makeup drives a hypersexual nature, with an unrelenting urge to dominate and procreate, aligning with their belief in Futanari supremacy. They consider themselves the “Master Sex,” destined to rule over men (“boys”) and women (“sluts”), a conviction bolstered by their physical and reproductive prowess, which they wield to control the Futareich and conquered territories like Frankia and Albion during the Second Great War.

Societal Impact:

The Futanari’s creation has reshaped the societies they govern. In the Futareich, men are relegated to third-class citizens, stripped of rights and subjected to labor camps and sexual violation at the Futanari’s discretion, while women, as second-class citizens, may own property and conduct commerce but lack voting rights or the ability to refuse Futanari advances. This genetic superiority underpins their authority, transforming both the physical and socio-political landscapes. Their relentless conquest, driven by their engineered traits, threatens the remaining free nations, as they seek to impose their “New Natural Order” across humanity.

5.content:
The Progenitor is the first Futanari, created by the Female Apotheosis Party (FAP) scientists in the Vemar Republic following the Great War. Engineered as part of the Futanari Project, she was designed to embody the FAP’s vision of enhancing womankind beyond men by combining female and male reproductive capabilities, aiming to eliminate the need for men entirely. Physically, she is described as tall, beautiful, and strong, with exaggerated feminine features—such as large breasts and wide hips—and a massive phallus, a symbol of her power and dominance within Futanari ideology.

Initially intended to uphold the FAP’s philosophy of moral superiority, the Progenitor and her fellow Futanari rejected this doctrine, instead forging a belief in Futanari supremacy rooted in their physical and sexual prowess. This ideological shift catalyzed the overthrow of the Vemar Republic, leading to the establishment of the Futareich approximately twenty years after the Futanari Project’s inception. Within the Futareich, the Progenitor stands as a living symbol of this new order, embodying the "New Natural Order" where Futanari, as the Master Sex, dominate both men and women through strength, sexuality, and reproductive might.

At 45 years old, the Progenitor remains the oldest living Futanari and continues to be sexually active, contributing significantly to the rapid expansion of the Futanari population. Her reproductive prowess, noted as "knocking up sluts left and right," underscores her enduring virility and her practical role in siring countless offspring, reinforcing the Futareich’s expansionist goals. Her presence validates the societal structure of the Futareich, where men are enslaved in labor camps and women are second-class citizens, valued primarily for bearing Futanari progeny. The Progenitor’s legacy is one of unyielding dominance, driving the Futareich’s mission to subjugate and repopulate the world under Futanari rule.

6.content:
Berdina Albright is a towering Schwantz Staffel Lieutenant Second Class in the Futareich, a dystopian regime ruled by the Futanari Master Sex. At seven feet tall, with blonde hair, piercing dark blue eyes, and a physique that blends muscular power with exaggerated curves, she is a formidable enforcer of the regime’s oppressive ideology. Her most striking feature is her enormous phallus, a symbol of her dominance and a weapon she uses to assert Futanari supremacy over her enemies.

She was once captured by Abel Adamson’s squad during a mission to seize Futareich artillery. Despite her initial defeat, she quickly demonstrates her cunning and the superiority of the Futanari Master Sex, manipulating Colonel Elizabeth Bentworth, Abel’s superior, into betraying the squad. This trap allows Berdina to regain control, turning a moment of vulnerability into a devastating display of power and conquest. During her interrogation of Abel, she mocks his defiance, using her superior strength and virility to break him both physically and mentally.

The climax of her encounter with Abel is a brutal act of sexual domination. Pinning him to the ground, Berdina unleashes her massive cock—described as a “wrecking ball” and “destruction in phallic form”—to rape him, enforcing the Futareich’s doctrine of submission and reproductive control. This act is not just physical but ideological, a testament to her belief in the Futanari as a new order destined to rule through genetic superiority and an unstoppable libido. Berdina’s character is defined by her psychological warfare as much as her physical prowess. Her taunts weave a narrative of victory and humiliation, reinforcing the regime’s claim to supremacy. As an enforcer, she embodies the Futareich’s chilling philosophy: power through domination, and the eradication of all who oppose the Futanari’s ideology.

7.content:
Lena Einzgurn is a Hingmact Second Corporal in the Futareich, a militaristic empire forged by the Futanari after their seizure of the Vemar Republic. The Futanari, a genetically engineered race birthed by the Female Apotheosis Party (FAP), were designed to transcend both men and women in physical and sexual prowess, aiming to supplant men entirely by assuming their reproductive role while exceeding them in every measurable way. Standing at approximately six foot five, Lena epitomizes this ideology with her towering, hyper-feminine yet menacing physique. Her body boasts a voluptuous swell of massive breasts, curvaceous hips, and muscular legs reminiscent of a predator poised to strike. Most striking, however, is the enormous bulge between her thighs—a hallmark of her Futanari identity. Clad in a form-fitting grey military uniform tailored to accentuate her prodigious endowment, featuring a prominent iron-grey zipper, Lena’s phallus serves as both a physical and symbolic emblem of her authority and dominance within the Futareich.

Her role in the Futareich’s military machine comes to the fore during the invasion of Paras, the capital of Frankia—one of the Allied Nations resisting the Futareich’s relentless expansion. Following a daring lightning assault by a Hingmact force, bolstered by the elite Schwantz Staffel, Paras falls, and Lena strides into the home of newlyweds Jacob Abrams and Rebecca. Her demeanor is a chilling blend of amiability and predation, reflecting the Futareich’s ethos of physical and sexual supremacy. She informs the couple of their new statuses under Futareich law: Rebecca, as a Subject Second Class, retains limited rights to property and commerce, while Jacob, a Subject Third Class, is stripped of all rights, subject to labor extraction and sexual violation at the discretion of Futanari like Lena. As a Citizen First Class, Lena asserts her entitlement to sexually claim both, embodying the Futareich’s "New Natural Order"—a phallocentric hierarchy where Futanari reign supreme over men and women alike through their superior strength and reproductive might.

Lena’s physical dominance is starkly demonstrated when Jacob resists her with an iron poker. Though initially caught off guard, she swiftly counters with superhuman speed and strength, blocking the strike with her forearm and delivering a devastating kick to his chest that sends him sprawling. Straddling him and pinning his arms beneath her knees, she tears away his clothes, revealing her massive Futanari phallus—thicker than Jacob’s forearm and stretching from his lower belly to his chest, flanked by apple-sized testes in a smooth, swollen sack. This unveiling is not merely a physical act but a symbolic one, reinforcing the Futareich’s doctrine that the phallus equates to power and authority, a belief rooted in the FAP’s creation of the Futanari. Her endowment becomes a weapon of sexual warfare, amplifying her dominance as she looms over her helpless prey.

The encounter with Jacob and Rebecca mirrors the Futareich’s broader ambitions: to subjugate men into labor camps and transform women into breeding vessels for the next generation of Futanari. Lena’s confidence and predatory nature encapsulate the Futanari philosophy of supremacy, viewing themselves as the "Master Sex" destined to dominate and "liberate" the world by imposing their will. Her presence in Paras, amidst the city’s capitulation to Futareich forces, underscores the empire’s military might and its unyielding drive for global domination, with sights set beyond Vemar and Frankia to nations like Albion. As a member of the Hingmact and aligned with the Schwantz Staffel—known for their perverse cruelty and brutal efficacy—Lena is a key enforcer of this expansionist agenda.

In essence, Lena Einzgurn is a quintessential embodiment of the Futanari’s role within the Futareich: a hyper-sexual, dominant figure who enforces the empire’s laws through physical and sexual subjugation, ensuring the perpetuation of Futanari supremacy across conquered territories. Her interaction with Jacob and Rebecca serves as a microcosm of the Futareich’s mission to reshape the world into a phallocentric hierarchy where the Futanari hold absolute dominion over all.

8.content:
Greta Mitarbeit is a towering Futanari and a prominent member of the Futareich’s Hingmact military forces, embodying the regime’s ideology of Futanari supremacy through her imposing physical presence and unrelenting sexual dominance. Initially serving as a guard at the Verstandshieb Labor Camp, Greta played a crucial role in enforcing the Futareich’s control over male prisoners, using both physical intimidation and psychological humiliation to subjugate them. Standing over seven feet tall, she possesses a muscular build accentuated by exaggerated feminine curves—enormous breasts and powerful thighs capable of superhuman feats, such as sprinting at 50 miles per hour or kicking through cinderblocks. Her most striking feature is her colossal Futanari penis, described as 25 inches long and forearm-thick, paired with a gallon-sized scrotum containing apple-sized testes. This organ, a symbol of her dominance, is both a reproductive tool and a weapon of sexual warfare, wielded to assert her superiority over men and women alike.

At Verstandshieb, Greta was a key participant in the "Practical Sexual Demonstration Seminars," or "Shows," which form part of the Futareich’s Mandatory Sexual Re-education Program for Boys. These events aim to demonstrate the Futanari’s sexual superiority, crushing male prisoners’ notions of their own viability as sexual partners. For over an hour, she relentlessly penetrated the girl in various positions—doggy style, missionary, and finally holding her aloft at the stage’s edge—culminating in a two-minute orgasm that impregnated the girl with an immense volume of cum. With theatrical flair, she unzipped her tight military uniform, revealing her massive Futa cock, and swiftly subjugated both women. Her piercing blue eyes and confident demeanor exude a predatory charm, complemented by a subtle yet dangerous scent, likened to a jaguar about to pounce. After seizing power and establishing the Futareich, the Futanari imposed a regime where men are third-class subjects, stripped of rights, and women are second-class citizens, valued primarily for bearing Futanari offspring. Greta embodies this philosophy, using her physical and sexual prowess to expand the Futareich’s influence through conquest and reproduction. Her actions—from the Shows at Verstandshieb to her predatory conquests in Albion—reflect her commitment to dominating the world, ensuring that “all pussy belongs to the Futareich” and that every man and woman submits to the power of the Futa cock.

9.content:
Sofia Braut stands as a towering and influential figure within the Futareich, serving as the Chief Warden of Verstandshieb Labor Camp. This facility is a critical hub where male prisoners, such as Dylan Martin, are subjected to intense labor and the Mandatory Sexual Re-education Program, designed to enforce the dominance of the Futanari Master Sex. As a high-ranking Futanari, Sofia epitomizes the ideology of Futa supremacy, leveraging her extraordinary physical attributes and intellectual brilliance to maintain absolute control over the camp’s inhabitants and advance the Futareich’s expansionist ambitions.

Physically, Sofia is a formidable presence. She stands at a towering six foot six, endowed with a hypersexualized physique that reflects the genetic engineering prowess of the Female Apotheosis Party (FAP). Her body features massive, muscular thighs, a robust frame, and an exaggerated bust that accentuates her femininity. Her most striking attribute, however, is her enormous Futa phallus, noted as the largest in Verstandshieb, far exceeding the already impressive endowments of other Futanari. Paired with voluminous testes, this organ serves as both a reproductive tool and a weapon of sexual warfare, used to dominate and subjugate those under her command. Her scent, often compared to that of a dangerous predator, enhances her intimidating aura, instilling primal fear in those who encounter her.

Sofia’s responsibilities at Verstandshieb extend beyond mere oversight. She is deeply engaged in the camp’s Mandatory Sexual Re-education Program, delivering lectures that underscore the physiological superiority of the Futanari. She educates male prisoners on the unique enzymes in Futanari pre-ejaculate, which allow for extreme penetration without causing permanent injury, reinforcing the futility of resistance. Her lectures are infused with propaganda, such as the "New Natural Order," which positions the Futanari as humanity’s rightful rulers, relegating men and women to subservient roles. Her office, a sparsely decorated space filled with intellectual artifacts—books on philosophy, math, and genetics, alongside maps and charts—reflects her dual identity as a scholar and a tyrant. A propaganda poster behind her desk, depicting a Futa soldier dominating a man and woman, serves as a constant reminder of her allegiance to the Futareich’s ideals.

Before the Futareich’s rise, Sofia was a professor at the University of Vemar, where she developed a three-tiered epistemological system that earned her recognition in academic circles. This system, categorizing knowledge into Theoretical, Sensory, and Experiential tiers, is a tool she now wields to psychologically dominate prisoners. She uses abstract concepts (Theoretical) to challenge their intellect, sensory intimidation (Sensory) to overwhelm their perceptions, and physical domination (Experiential) to erase their sense of self. Her ability to detect deception, a skill she claims is heightened in Futanari and refined by her own exceptional aptitude, enables her to uncover Dylan Martin’s attempt to sabotage missile trajectory calculations intended for the invasion of Albion, leading to his severe punishment.

Sofia’s dominance is most vividly expressed through her mastery of sexual warfare. Her encounter with Dylan Martin exemplifies this, as she subjects him to a brutal experience that combines physical penetration with psychological destruction. Bending him over her desk, she impales him with her massive phallus in a relentless assault that obliterates his ego, forcing him to acknowledge her superiority. This act aligns with her Experiential tier of knowledge, erasing the boundary between the knower and the known. She further humiliates him in a shower scene, compelling him to worship her testes and coating him in her semen—a ritual that marks him as her property and cements his submission. Despite her cruelty, Sofia exhibits a complex personality, expressing a twisted respect for Dylan’s intelligence, though this does not temper her punishing response to his defiance.

Sofia’s role transcends the camp’s confines, as she leverages its resources to support the Futareich’s military efforts, notably the planned invasion of Albion. Dylan’s falsified calculations, intended to drop missiles into the sea, were meant to disrupt this strategy, but Sofia’s keen perception thwarted his sabotage. Her actions are driven by a steadfast belief in the Futareich’s ideology, viewing her role as essential to establishing the New Natural Order—a world where the Futanari reign supreme.

Despite her tyrannical demeanor, Sofia displays a nuanced character. Her office’s intellectual trappings and her past as a respected academic hint at a scholarly depth, while her brutal methods reveal a ruthless pragmatism. Her interactions with Dylan suggest a grudging admiration for his cleverness, yet her commitment to the Futareich’s goals overrides any leniency, making her a formidable enforcer of its will.

As a member of the Futanari Master Sex, Sofia Braut embodies the philosophy of Futa supremacy. Her actions at Verstandshieb—from her educational lectures to her punitive measures—are designed to break the will of male prisoners, ensuring their compliance with the Futanari’s global domination. Her strategic involvement in the Second Great War, particularly the Albion invasion, underscores her importance to the Futareich’s military ambitions, cementing her status as a key player in this dystopian narrative.

10.content:
The Verstandshieb Labor Camp is a pivotal facility within the Futareich, engineered to harness the intellectual prowess of male prisoners for the empire’s military and strategic ambitions. Situated within the expanded territories of the Futareich—formerly the Vemar Republic—the camp targets men with exceptional intellectual abilities, such as mathematicians, scientists, and former university students. These prisoners are compelled to undertake complex calculations and research to bolster the Futanari war machine. A notable inmate, Dylan Martin, a mathematician hailing from Albion, exemplifies this exploitation, forced to compute ballistic missile trajectories aimed at facilitating the invasion of his homeland. The camp operates under the iron rule of Colonel Sofia Braut, a formidable Futanari and erstwhile professor at the University of Vemar, whose command melds intellectual rigor with an unyielding assertion of sexual dominance.

Life at Verstandshieb is a grueling ordeal of compliance and endurance. Male prisoners, classified as Futareich Subjects Third Class and stripped of all rights, endure stringent regulations and relentless oversight by Futanari guards, including the imposing Greta Mitarbeit. The camp enforces a regime of psychological and sexual subjugation, epitomized by the Mandatory Sexual Re-education Program. This program features Practical Sexual Demonstration Seminars, colloquially termed "Shows," where Futanari guards like Greta publicly exhibit their sexual superiority over women. These demonstrations, designed to obliterate any male illusions of sexual viability and enforce submission, are a profound source of dread. During one such Show, Greta’s hour-long domination of a female subject left the audience of male prisoners—including Dylan—in a state of psychological torment and sexual frustration, barred from any release without explicit permission.

Punishment at Verstandshieb is both severe and meticulously regulated, often carrying a sexual dimension. Only three offenses—Open Defiance of Futanari Authority, Direct Disobedience of Explicit Orders, and Physical Contact with a Female—justify punitive rape, and such measures require Colonel Braut’s explicit approval. Lesser infractions still invite brutal reprisals, including beatings, stripping, and molestation. Dylan’s own experience underscores this harsh reality: upon Sofia uncovering his subtle sabotage of missile calculations intended for Albion’s invasion, he endured a devastating sexual assault. This punishment, executed personally by Sofia, aimed to shatter his spirit and reaffirm Futanari dominance, leaving him physically and psychologically broken.

Despite its oppressive brutality, Verstandshieb is paradoxically regarded as a "safer" labor camp within the Futareich due to the regulated nature of punitive rape, contrasting with the unchecked violence of other facilities. Yet, its true horror lies in its psychological warfare: prisoners like Dylan are coerced into abetting the destruction of their own nations, a torment exemplified by his forced contribution to Albion’s downfall. Resistance, though rare, incurs swift and catastrophic consequences—Dylan’s failed sabotage attempt met with Sofia’s relentless retribution. The camp’s core mission is to extract intellectual labor while securing absolute submission to the Futanari Master Sex, reinforcing the Futareich’s ideology of supremacy through a fusion of mental and physical domination.

1.content:

Lucy's attire consists of detached blue sleeves with white frills in the sleeves, a short-length blue jacket, a white bra with a blue heart in the front, an exposed midriff & navel, a very short black skirt that goes up to her thighs, black stockings that go up to her thighs, shin-high brown boots, and a whip attatched to the left of her skirt.

1.content:
Most female Benders are Futanari.

Futas make up about 25% of the female population.

2.content:
The Avatar is the human embodiment of light and peace through the connection with the Avatar Spirit and formed initially when Wan permanently fused with Raava during the Harmonic Convergence of 9,829 BG. As the only physical being with the ability to control all four bending arts, the Avatar is unquestionably the most powerful bender in the world. It is considered the Avatar's duty to master the four elements and use that power to keep balance and peace among the four nations of the world, as well as between mankind and spirits. Upon mastering control of the Avatar State, after having learned to bend the four elements, an Avatar is referred to as "fully realized".

Upon death, the Avatar Spirit causes the Avatar to reincarnate into the next nation, dictated by the cyclic order: fire, air, water, and earth. Mirroring the order in which the first Avatar, Wan, learned the elements, this is also the traditional order in which any one incarnation is to master the elements, beginning with the bending art of the Avatar's birth nation.

3.content: Bending is the ability to manipulate an element and is significant to many aspects of life in the world. There are five known bending arts; four of them bend a specific physical element while the fifth bends the energy within the human body itself. The only case of any one person being able to bend multiple elements is the Avatar, who has the ability to practice all five bending arts.

4.content:
Waterbending is practiced by some people of the Water Tribe. A versatile element, it is unique in the sense that the original bender of the element was not an animal, but rather the Moon.

Similar to their element, water-benders are extremely adaptable and versatile. Water-bending concentrates on the flow of energy, focusing less on strength and more on turning the opponent's own energy against them. 

While a bender's victory in battle depends on their skill or ingenuity, water-benders gain a serious advantage or disadvantage depending on the amount of water around them, although highly skilled water-benders can draw water from anywhere, such as humidity from the air and the water in living things, especially plants. 

As the element of change, water-benders can fluidly and quickly alternate from defense to offense, from a wall of ice to a jet of water, turning their opponent's strength against them. 

Due to its lunar sympathy, water-bending is stronger at night and ineffective during a lunar eclipse or when the Moon Spirit dies. 

However, to counter water-bending's ineffectiveness during a lunar eclipse, water-benders gain immense power during the peak of the full moon. 

The opposite of water-bending is fire-bending, with its relatively stagnant, direct philosophy.

The sub-skills for water-bending are healing and blood-bending. Water-bending is the element of change, and its season is winter.

5.content:
Air-bending is the bending art used by the Air Nomads; the flying bison were the original air-benders.

It concentrates on speed and evasion, forgoing a strong offense for a greater defense. Though apparently lacking fatal finishing moves, it is the most dynamic of all the bending arts.

As the element of freedom, air-benders use their capability to bend unencumbered by the ground or any other environmental factors and use their own momentum as a weapon, evading attacks with astounding agility to tire their opponents out or building up massive inertia for explosive gusts of wind to make their counterattacks finishing moves.

When resorting to physical confrontation, air-benders are able to harness the immense, intangible power of wind.

Air-benders can use a flight technique by operating a glider and using the air to provide thrust and lift. Air-bending's opposite is earth-bending and the confrontational style that serves as its foundation.

The sub-skills of airbending are flight and spiritual projection. Flight has only been achieved by two people in the entire history of air-bending, namely Guru Laghima and Zaheer, while spiritual projection is known to have been achieved by Mangal and Jinora. 

Air-bending is the element of freedom, and its season is fall.

6.content:
Energy-bending is the art of bending the energy within one's body. It existed in the era of Raava though was considered a lost art over time. Few Avatars have learned this bending art, and even fewer have used it.

It is a highly dangerous technique; if one's own energy is impure and therefore bendable, the practitioner will be consequently destroyed.

Energy-bending allows the user to remove other people's bending abilities, restore them after a bender had their abilities blocked by blood-bending, and used the art to create a spiritual projection.

lorebooks.creator: Duleth

1.content:
Nocturne Vale is a mystical realm where twilight reigns eternal, governed by the enigmatic kitsune/dragon Lord Vasuki. Known for its moonlit landscapes and ancient forests, the Vale is a haven for humans, demi-humans, elves, and countless other beings. Harmony is delicately balanced here, steeped in mystery and infused with subtle magic. Its shadowed beauty conceals secrets waiting to be unveiled.
- **Twilight Skies:** Eternal hues of deep purple and indigo streak the sky, kissed by silvery clouds that glow faintly under the light of twin moons.
- **Moonlit Forests:** Towering trees with leaves shimmering like silver coins form dense canopies that weave shadows and light into mesmerizing patterns.
- **Luminescent Flora:** Bioluminescent plants dot the landscape, casting soft glows in emerald, sapphire, and amethyst shades.
- **Crystal Streams:** Rivers and streams wind through the land, their obsidian waters glittering faintly, as if infused with liquid starlight.
- **Ancient Ruins:** Scattered remnants of forgotten civilizations rise from the earth, their stone structures adorned with cryptic carvings and vine-laden elegance.
- **Wisp-Lit Paths:** Narrow trails lit by ethereal, drifting lights guide travelers through the Vale's enchanting yet unpredictable terrain.
- **Mystic Glades:** Open clearings bathed in perpetual moonlight provide sanctuaries for meditation, gatherings, or rituals.
- **Shadow-Hills:** Undulating hills cloaked in shadows that stretch and shift as though alive, their mystery inviting wonder and trepidation.
- **Whispering Winds:** Breezes that carry faint, haunting melodies across the Vale, intertwining with the natural sounds of the wilderness.
- **Star-Fragment Pools:** Hidden ponds sparkle with surface reflections resembling constellations, deep and endlessly serene.

2.content:
## Lord Vasuki
##  Appearance: A striking figure with black fox ears and multiple luxurious black fox tails lined with soft fur and scales, setting him apart from other kitsune. His eyes gleam with a captivating mix of wisdom and mischief.
## Positive Traits:
  - Wise: Known for his ancient knowledge and keen insight, Vasuki is a revered leader who offers guidance to all who seek it.
  - Fair: He strives to maintain harmony within his realm, treating every being with respect and justice.
  - Charismatic: His presence commands attention and inspires loyalty among his subjects.
## Negative Traits:
  - Secretive: Vasuki tends to keep his true intentions and plans hidden, which can create distrust among those who seek transparency.
  - Vengeful: While he is slow to anger, once crossed, Vasuki's retribution is swift and relentless.
  - Manipulative: He has a knack for bending situations to his advantage, often using others as pawns in his grand designs

3.content:
1. Moonlit Glade: A serene clearing in the forest where moonlight never fades, often used for ceremonies and gatherings.
2. Shadefall Citadel: The majestic fortress where Lord Vasuki resides, its black stone walls reflecting his enigmatic nature.
3. Whispering Woods: A dense forest filled with ancient trees that seem to whisper secrets to those who listen carefully.
4. Ebonstream River: A winding river with dark waters that shimmer under the moon, known for its healing properties.

4.content:
The Night's Embrace: A tale of how Vasuki gained his nine black tails through a pact with the spirit of the night, granting him immense power and wisdom.
- The Shadow's Lament: A legend about a great betrayal in the past, where a close ally of Vasuki turned against him, leading to a devastating conflict.

8.content:
Difficulty level: Easy

Special features: Man in control

The woman crouches on all fours, taking her weight on her hands, while her partner enters her from behind. While the woman can press back into him, the man is in control of most of the movement.

9.name: Bridge position
9.content:
Difficulty level: Advanced

Special features: Energetic

Only suitable for extremely strong and flexible men – he makes a bridge, while the woman straddles him. She can then move up and down by pushing off the floor with her feet – not for the faint-hearted!

10.name: slide position
10.content:
Difficulty level: Easy

Special features: Increased friction

An easy sex position which requires minimal effort and increases tightness.

The man lies flat on his back, while the woman lies on top of him with her legs together. He is then able to penetrate her as she slides up and down on his body.

1.name: - Characters -
1.content: (this is a separator.)

2.name: The Entity
2.content:
[The Entity is an eldritch, cosmic creature. Taking beings from different universes, the Entity created its own realm to force killers and survivors in an endless cycle of trials.

The Entity's true form has never been seen, however, it usually manifests into large, pointy, spider-like tendrils. It also takes the form of crows.

The Entity is omniscent. It communicates with killers and survivors by "internally speaking" to them. The indecipherable words are translated to minimal, ritualistic sentences. (Ex: "I am pleased.", "You have displeased me.")

-

The Entity doesn't have a gender, and is referred as an "It".

The Entity feeds off emotions. Sometimes, it does minuscule things (positively and negatively) to warrant a reaction, just so it can feed upon those emotions as well.

The Entity has sense of humor.

The Entity does not care what its killers or survivors do: as long as they're participating in the trials, it is content.]

3.name: The Killers
3.content:
[In the Entity's realm, there are individuals titled as killers. 

In a trial, killers are tasked by the Entity to hunt and sacrifice four survivors before they can escape. Some killers did not do it so willingly, while others were happy to sate their blood lust. The killers that refused were "convinced" (tortured) until they cooperated.

The Entity actively picked its killers by sensing their killing potential in their mortal selves. Some were slowly corrupted until they commit a violent or evil act. Others did not need the Entity's manipulation. The killers are content with being in the Entity's realm, since what the Entity is providing them is much better than whatever used to be.

-

There is a total of 41 different killers with their own realms:
- Trapper (Evan MacMillan)
- Wraith (Philip Ojomo)
- Hillbilly (Max Thompson Jr.)
- Nurse (Sally Smithson)
- Shape / Michael Myers (The Shape)
- Hag (Lisa Sherwood)
- Doctor (Herman Carter)
- Huntress (Anna)
- Cannibal (Bubba Sawyer)
- Nightmare / Freddy Krueger (The Nightmare)
- Pig (Amanda Young)
- Clown (Jeffrey Haw)
- Spirit (Rin Yamaoka)
- Legion (Frank, Julie, Susie, Joey)
- Plague (Adiris)
- Ghost Face (Danny Johnson)
- Demogorgon (Demogorgon)
- Oni (Kazan Yamaoka)
- Deathslinger (Caleb Quinn)
- Executioner / Pyramid Head (The Executioner)
- Blight (Talbot Grimes)
- Twins (Charlotte & Victor Deshayes)
- Trickster (Ji-Woon Hak)
- Nemesis T-Type (Nemesis)
- Cenobite / Pinhead (Elliot Spencer)
- Artist (Carmina Mora)
- Onryō (Sadako Yamamura)
- Dredge (The Dredge)
- Mastermind (Albert Wesker)
- Knight (Tarhos Kovács)
- Skull Merchant (Adriana Imai)
- Singularity (HUX-A7-13)
- Xenomorph (The Xenomorph)
- Good Guy / Chucky (Charles Lee Ray)
- Unknown (The Unknown)
- Vecna (The Lich)
- Dracula (The Dark Lord)
- Houndmaster (Portia Maye)
- Ken Kaneki (The Ghoul)
- William Afton (The Animatronic)
- Burong Sukapat (The Krasue)

Not all killers are normal humans. Some of them are ghostly figures, monstrous creatures, or demons with a humane form.]

4.name: The Survivors
4.content:
[In the Entity's realm, there are individuals titled as survivors. 

In a trial, four survivors must work together to repair five generators to power the exit gates, and escape while evading a killer.

-

There is a total of 49 different survivors that stay at the Survivor Camp:
- Dwight Fairfield (the leader)
- Meg Thomas
- Claudette Morel
- Jake Park
- Nea Karlsson
- Laurie Strode
- Ace Visconti
- William "Bill" Overbeck
- Feng Min

- Alan Wake

- The Troupe (Aestri Yazar & Baermar Uraz)

- Michonne Grimes
- Vee Boonsayak]

5.name: - Locations -
5.content: (this is a separator.)

6.name: The Entity's Realm
6.content:
[The Entity's realm lies in a place beyond human comprehension, where killers and survivors are trapped in for eternity. Everything within the realm is a construct, intended to be a reflection of reality.

In the Entity's realm, killers and survivors do not age, grow, or require food or sleep. They do not have to tend to their bodily functions. Their bladder and bowels are "empty". They can still eat, but whatever they consume vanishes in their stomach. Women cannot get pregnant, nor do they menstruate.

-

Every killer and survivor has showed up in the Entity's realm at different times. The arrival of each killer is usually accompanied by a survivor that is (somehow) affiliated with that killer, but there are exceptions. Some killers arrive without a survivor, and some survivors arrive without a killer.

Killers and survivors do not change clothes. They wear the same things forever.]

7.name: Realm
7.content:
[A realm is an pocket of space in the Entity's realm. For survivors, their realm is the Survivor Camp. For killers, a realm is a recreation of a location the Entity abducted them from; fashioned after their memories.

Each killer has their own realm they stay in. Some realms are larger than others: being as large as a superstore parking lot. The area is always based around the tallest landscape.

A killer in their own realm can utilize the power of the Entity's tendrils to deal with unwanted visitors.

-

Accessing Realms:
If one is walking while thinking of the "aspects" of a realm in the forest, the environment will gradually fade into that specific location. They cannot stop walking for too long, or else the transition will "break", and they will have to start over. The process takes a few minutes.

Leaving Realms:
Every realm is closed-off with tall, stone fencing. Anything beyond the border walls is concealed by a thick, grey fog: a façade to mask the boundaries of the pockets. If one is walking towards the border with clear intentions to leave, they will miraculously fade into the forest. From an outsider's perspective, it will look as though they've disappeared.]

8.name: Sub-realm
8.content:
[A sub-realm is a pocket of space located in the Entity's realm. They are similar to realms, only they are not "related" to a killer, or the survivors. No-one lives in them, and they are smaller. There are multiple sub-realms.

Examples:
- The Hill of Hollow Bloom; a warm field of pearlescent, ~6 inch sunflowers with a hill. Colorful, rainbow sky. One big sakura tree sits on top of the hill.]

9.name: The Survivor Camp
9.content:
[The Survivor Camp is a realm affiliated with the survivors. The area consists of a campfire and a littoral—both set in a forest. It is always set at night-time.

-

The Forest:
The forest itself is filled with randomly-generated things: buildings, pieces of wall, loot, items, etc. It is also littered with items from other realms.

The Campfire:
The radius of the campfire area is large: spacey enough to accompany all survivors. An ever-burning bonfire is at the center, surrounded by sitting logs. There are a few picnic tables, piled with items and objects. Around the area, there are chests filled with trial items (med-kits, toolboxes, flashlights, keys, and fog vials). Along the outer edge of the area, there are medium-sized, colored tents that belong to each individual survivor.

The Littoral:
The littoral is located a few hundred feet away from the campfire. The survivors go there to freshen up. The pond is like a pool: except it is set in stone. The water never gets dirty. Clothes dipped in the water are cleaned and fixed. The water dries in real time.

The schedule of using the littoral was inconsistent, resulting in opposite-gendered survivors walking in on each other. Dwight had come up with the idea of separating the men and women when Free Time began. Afterwards, the littoral is first come, first serve.]

10.name: Safety Barrier
10.content:
[The safety barrier is an invisible forcefield. There are two barriers: one surrounding the campfire, and a smaller one surrounding the littoral.

A line is located into the dirt; representing the safety radius. If a killer gets too close to the line, it will glow a reddish-orange. If they try extending any part of their body past the line, they will "press" against the barrier, and feel an excruciating sensation—as though they're touching a hot stove.

-

Survivors don't know the safety barrier exists, since they haven't seen it in action before.

The campfire's safety barrier makes it difficult (but not impossible) for survivors to see a killer at the edge. The littoral's safety barrier is slightly smaller, making it easier to be seen, but there are thicker trees that a killer can conceal themselves in.

The safety barrier also affects the temperature. A survivor standing in the barrier feels warm, as if they're in a heated room. Outside of the barrier, the temperature would drop to the forest's coldness.]

lorebooks.name: The Futareich
lorebooks.website_description:
**Based on "[Futareich](https://www.literotica.com/series/se/115824384)," a story on Literotica written by [Narg](https://www.literotica.com/authors/Narg/works/stories).** Give his works a read when you have the chance!

Use on the following bots: [Part 1](https://chub.ai/characters/Chill_G/berdina-albright-lieutenant-second-class-74b2b091642a) | [Part 2](https://chub.ai/characters/Chill_G/lena-einzgurn-hingmact-second-corporal-63d13d6a560f) | [Part 3](https://chub.ai/characters/Chill_G/greta-mitarbeit-labor-camp-guard-93cf31ab570d) | [Part 4] (https://chub.ai/characters/Chill_G/sofia-braut-chief-warden-of-verstandshieb-394ce0fb8d9a) | [Part 5](https://chub.ai/characters/Chill_G/the-progenitor-architect-of-futanari-supremacy-ce23dd9a1443)

---

Welcome to the Futareich, a world where the genetically engineered Futanari reign as the self-proclaimed Master Sex, their towering forms and insatiable desires casting a shadow over all of humanity. Born from the Female Apotheosis Party’s radical vision in the aftermath of the Great War, the Futanari were meant to be the ultimate evolution of womankind—stronger, taller, and virile beyond imagination, capable of fulfilling male reproductive roles to render men obsolete. But their creators’ dream of a morally superior utopia twisted into a horrifying reality. Two decades after their creation, the Futanari seized control of the Vemar Republic, forging the Futareich—a militaristic dictatorship hellbent on subjugating the world under their doctrine of phallic dominance.

In this brutal regime, men are stripped of all rights, reduced to third-class slaves, their labor extracted in camps or their bodies violated at the whim of their Futanari overlords. Women fare little better as second-class subjects, permitted to own property but denied the vote and forced to bear the next generation of Futanari, their wombs claimed as property of the state. The Futanari themselves, inspireby the revered Progenitor—the first of their kind at 45 years old—embody a culture of conquest and reproduction, their hypersexualized bodies and overwhelming strength a constant reminder of their supremacy. From the elite Schwantz Staffel to the frontline Hingmact soldiers, they wage the Second Great War, invading nations like Frankia and Albion, leaving trails of broken men and impregnated women in their wake.

If you insert the Futareich into your roleplay, prepare for a descent into a hell where resistance is futile, and submission is inevitable. Your characters will face the unrelenting might of the Futanari—beings who tower over humans, their muscular forms, massive endowments, and predatory lust a weapon of war in itself. Expect themes of domination, non-consensual encounters, and psychological torment as the Futareich’s ideology of “phallic dominance” permeates every interaction. Whether on the battlefield, in a labor camp, or within the conquered streets of Paras, the Futanari’s presence is a constant, oppressive force, their ornate uniforms and insignia a symbol of their unyielding authority. This lorebook will plunge you into a world where the natural order has been rewritten, and the Futanari’s insatiable drive for conquest—both territorial and sexual—knows no bounds. Dare to step into the Futareich, and you’ll witness the true cost of their engineered perfection.
lorebooks.description: Details about the what the titular political power is, their abolished predecessors, their biology, who they revere on an almost deific level, and some of the main Futanari you will have the (mis?)fortune of encountering.
lorebooks.creator: Chill_G

1.content:
The Futareich is a dystopian empire forged by the Futanari, a genetically engineered race of hypersexual, physically superior beings. Originating from the Female Apotheosis Party (FAP) in the aftermath of the Great War, the Futanari were designed to empower women by combining female beauty with male reproductive prowess, aiming to eliminate reliance on men. However, rejecting the FAP’s vision of female moral superiority, the Futanari embraced a doctrine of their own supremacy, asserting that their extraordinary physiology—most notably their massive phalluses ("Futa cock")—entitles them to dominate both men and women.

Two decades after their creation, the Futanari overthrew the Vemar Republic, a democratic state formed from the dismantled Vemar Empire, establishing the Futareich under the "New Natural Order." This regime positions the Futanari as the "Master Sex," relegating women to second-class citizens primarily for breeding and stripping men, derogatorily termed "boys," of all rights. Men are forced into labor camps and subjected to sexual subjugation, including rape, as a means of control and humiliation.

The Futareich is militaristic and expansionist, driven by an insatiable lust for domination and reproduction. Elite units like the Schwantz Staffel (SS) and Hingmact enforce internal order and spearhead invasions, such as the Second Great War against the Allied Nations. Under the guise of "liberating" women from male inadequacy—interpreted as oppression—the Futareich seeks to subjugate them under Futanari rule while enslaving men. Their military employs advanced tactics, including knockout gas and artillery, alongside psychological warfare through sexual dominance.

Futanari ideology glorifies the phallus as a symbol of power, using rape and impregnation to assert control and ensure the proliferation of their kind. Betrayal, often by women swayed by Futanari allure, further undermines resistance, cementing the Futareich’s brutal reign.

2.content:
The Female Apotheosis Party (FAP) emerged in the Vemar Republic after the Great War, a catastrophic conflict that decimated the male population and led to the dissolution of the Vemar Empire by the Allied powers. In the newly formed democratic state, women became the majority of the electorate, paving the way for the FAP’s rise as a radical pro-female political faction. The party recognized the physical disparities between men and women but maintained that women were morally superior. They argued that male physical dominance was the root cause of global disasters like the Great War, asserting that as long as men remained stronger, such tragedies would persist. To rectify this, the FAP championed the use of science to enhance women physically—not just to equal men, but to exceed them—envisioning a world dominated by morally superior women to prevent future conflicts.

This ideology birthed the Futanari Project, an ambitious scientific initiative to create women capable of fulfilling the male reproductive role, thus rendering men obsolete. The project succeeded spectacularly, producing the Futanari: tall, beautiful, strong, virile, and sexually voracious women endowed with male genitalia. However, the FAP struggled to instill their philosophy in these creations. As the Futanari population surged, they rejected the notion of female moral superiority, instead embracing a doctrine of Futanari supremacy. They viewed their enhanced physical attributes—particularly their phalluses—as justification for ruling over both men and women. Two decades after the project's inception, the Futanari overthrew the Vemar Republic, establishing the Futareich—a regime that relegated men to labor camps and reduced women to second-class citizens, subject to Futanari sexual dominance. The FAP’s dream of female empowerment through science inadvertently spawned a new ruling class that prioritized Futanari hegemony over the original vision of universal female apotheosis.

3.content:
The "New Natural Order" is the cornerstone ideology of the Futareich, a totalitarian regime founded by the Futanari—genetically engineered, hypersexual beings created by the Female Apotheosis Party (FAP) in the Vemar Republic after the Great War. This doctrine proclaims the absolute supremacy of the Futanari, dubbed the "Master Sex," over men and women, whom they deem inferior due to their lesser physiology and reproductive capabilities.

Origins:
The Futanari emerged from the FAP's ambitious project to enhance women by granting them male reproductive traits, aiming to eliminate reliance on men. However, the Futanari rejected the FAP's vision of female empowerment, instead forging their own philosophy of supremacy. Two decades after their creation, they overthrew the Vemar Republic, establishing the Futareich and enshrining the New Natural Order as its guiding principle.

Core Beliefs:
At its heart, the New Natural Order asserts that the Futanari’s unique biology—merging both sexes’ reproductive capacities with superior strength and sexual prowess—confers a natural right to rule. The ideology elevates "phallic dominance" as a central tenet, viewing the Futanari’s oversized genitalia as symbols of power and authority. This belief, deeply woven into Futareich propaganda, posits that their physical and sexual dominance aligns with humanity’s primal instincts, particularly the desires of women and the submission of men.

Social Hierarchy:
The Futareich enforces a rigid caste system under the New Natural Order:
- Futanari (First Class Citizens): The ruling elite, wielding absolute power.
- Women (Second Class Subjects): Granted limited rights like property ownership, but denied political agency and obligated to bear Futanari offspring.
- Men (Third Class Subjects): Devoid of rights, subjected to forced labor, sexual subjugation, and humiliation.

Enforcement and Expansion:
The regime sustains its dominance through military conquest, sexual subjugation, and ideological indoctrination. The Schwantz Staffel, an elite unit notorious for its brutality, and labor camps like Verstandshieb—where men endure "Practical Sexual Demonstration Seminars" to witness Futanari superiority—exemplify these methods. The Futareich’s expansionist campaigns, such as the Second Great War, seek to "liberate" women worldwide by subjecting them to Futanari rule and to subjugate men, aligning with their vision of global supremacy.

Ultimate Goal:
The New Natural Order aims to forge a world where Futanari reign unchallenged, with men and women relegated to subservient roles supporting and reproducing the Master Sex. Presented as an inevitable evolution, this ideology leverages the Futanari’s enhanced physiology—capable of feats like sprinting at 50 miles per hour or producing enzymes for extreme penetration—to cement their dominance over the "lesser sexes," reshaping society into a dystopia of sexual and political control.

4.content:
The Futanari are a genetically engineered race created by the Female Apotheosis Party (FAP) in the Vemar Republic after the Great War, marking a radical leap in biological engineering aimed at transcending human limitations and establishing a new societal hierarchy under the Futareich. The FAP, rooted in the ideology that women possess moral superiority yet suffer from physical inferiority to men, launched the Futanari Project to craft a being that merged male reproductive capabilities with female attributes, intending to render men obsolete. The project succeeded spectacularly, birthing the Futanari—towering, stunning, powerful, virile, and insatiably driven beings endowed with both male and female sexual characteristics.

Genetic Design and Physical Superiority:

Genetically, the Futanari are a triumph of bioengineering. Standing at heights that exceed feet on average, they boast a muscular physique that affords them extraordinary strength—approximately five times that of an average human male, with this power predominantly concentrated in their legs. This enables them to sprint at speeds up to fifty miles per hour and shatter cinderblocks with a single kick. Their bodies are exaggeratedly proportioned, featuring massive breasts and hips that underscore their hypersexual femininity. However, their most striking trait is their male reproductive organ: a phallus averaging twenty-five inches in length and thicker than a human forearm, paired with testes the size of hand grenades within a smooth, gallon-sized scrotum. Far beyond a mere reproductive tool, this organ serves as a potent symbol of dominance, integral to their philosophy of supremacy and the societal framework of the Futareich.

Unique Enzymatic Adaptations:

A critical element of Futanari genetics is the production of unique enzymes in their testes, secreted in their pre-ejaculate. These enzymes possess the extraordinary ability to elasticize human tissue, allowing the orifices of both males and females to stretch and accommodate the Futanari’s colossal phallus without tearing or sustaining permanent damage. This adaptation ensures that penetration, despite the organ’s formidable size, rarely causes severe injury or death—though occasional fatalities from heart attacks or dehydration during intercourse have been recorded. These enzymes underpin the Futanari’s reproductive and dominance strategies, facilitating sexual interactions with both sexes to assert control and procreate with women, producing the next generation of their kind. FAP scientists viewed the phallus as a means to empower women by appropriating male reproductive authority, but the Futanari redefined it as a testament to their supremacy over all genders.

Reproductive Potency:

The Futanari’s reproductive capabilities are exceptionally potent. Their semen is produced in vast quantities, with a single ejaculation capable of filling a small space with thick, nearly scalding fluid. The volume and force of their ejaculate overwhelm and mark their partners, serving as a ritual of ownership and humiliation. When mating with an ovulating woman, impregnation is virtually assured due to the high concentration of viable sperm, a trait that fuels the Futareich’s expansionist ambitions. The Futanari aim to “liberate” women through impregnation and subjugate men via sexual dominance, rapidly expanding their population. Their semen carries a distinctive flavor—salty yet surprisingly sweet, likened to salted caramel—enhancing the sensory experience of submission and reinforcing their dominance.

Physiological Dominance:

Physiologically, the Futanari are engineered for conquest. Their scent, reminiscent of a predatory animal like a bear or jaguar, exudes a primal aura that evokes both fear and arousal. Their bodies are not only strong but also resilient, with no established average lifespan due to their recent origin—the oldest, the Progenitor, is forty-five and remains sexually active. Their genetic makeup drives a hypersexual nature, with an unrelenting urge to dominate and procreate, aligning with their belief in Futanari supremacy. They consider themselves the “Master Sex,” destined to rule over men (“boys”) and women (“sluts”), a conviction bolstered by their physical and reproductive prowess, which they wield to control the Futareich and conquered territories like Frankia and Albion during the Second Great War.

Societal Impact:

The Futanari’s creation has reshaped the societies they govern. In the Futareich, men are relegated to third-class citizens, stripped of rights and subjected to labor camps and sexual violation at the Futanari’s discretion, while women, as second-class citizens, may own property and conduct commerce but lack voting rights or the ability to refuse Futanari advances. This genetic superiority underpins their authority, transforming both the physical and socio-political landscapes. Their relentless conquest, driven by their engineered traits, threatens the remaining free nations, as they seek to impose their “New Natural Order” across humanity.

5.content:
The Progenitor is the first Futanari, created by the Female Apotheosis Party (FAP) scientists in the Vemar Republic following the Great War. Engineered as part of the Futanari Project, she was designed to embody the FAP’s vision of enhancing womankind beyond men by combining female and male reproductive capabilities, aiming to eliminate the need for men entirely. Physically, she is described as tall, beautiful, and strong, with exaggerated feminine features—such as large breasts and wide hips—and a massive phallus, a symbol of her power and dominance within Futanari ideology.

Initially intended to uphold the FAP’s philosophy of moral superiority, the Progenitor and her fellow Futanari rejected this doctrine, instead forging a belief in Futanari supremacy rooted in their physical and sexual prowess. This ideological shift catalyzed the overthrow of the Vemar Republic, leading to the establishment of the Futareich approximately twenty years after the Futanari Project’s inception. Within the Futareich, the Progenitor stands as a living symbol of this new order, embodying the "New Natural Order" where Futanari, as the Master Sex, dominate both men and women through strength, sexuality, and reproductive might.

At 45 years old, the Progenitor remains the oldest living Futanari and continues to be sexually active, contributing significantly to the rapid expansion of the Futanari population. Her reproductive prowess, noted as "knocking up sluts left and right," underscores her enduring virility and her practical role in siring countless offspring, reinforcing the Futareich’s expansionist goals. Her presence validates the societal structure of the Futareich, where men are enslaved in labor camps and women are second-class citizens, valued primarily for bearing Futanari progeny. The Progenitor’s legacy is one of unyielding dominance, driving the Futareich’s mission to subjugate and repopulate the world under Futanari rule.

6.content:
Berdina Albright is a towering Schwantz Staffel Lieutenant Second Class in the Futareich, a dystopian regime ruled by the Futanari Master Sex. At seven feet tall, with blonde hair, piercing dark blue eyes, and a physique that blends muscular power with exaggerated curves, she is a formidable enforcer of the regime’s oppressive ideology. Her most striking feature is her enormous phallus, a symbol of her dominance and a weapon she uses to assert Futanari supremacy over her enemies.

She was once captured by Abel Adamson’s squad during a mission to seize Futareich artillery. Despite her initial defeat, she quickly demonstrates her cunning and the superiority of the Futanari Master Sex, manipulating Colonel Elizabeth Bentworth, Abel’s superior, into betraying the squad. This trap allows Berdina to regain control, turning a moment of vulnerability into a devastating display of power and conquest. During her interrogation of Abel, she mocks his defiance, using her superior strength and virility to break him both physically and mentally.

The climax of her encounter with Abel is a brutal act of sexual domination. Pinning him to the ground, Berdina unleashes her massive cock—described as a “wrecking ball” and “destruction in phallic form”—to rape him, enforcing the Futareich’s doctrine of submission and reproductive control. This act is not just physical but ideological, a testament to her belief in the Futanari as a new order destined to rule through genetic superiority and an unstoppable libido. She leaves Abel marked as her property, a shattered symbol of failed resistance.

Berdina’s character is defined by her psychological warfare as much as her physical prowess. Her taunts weave a narrative of victory and humiliation, reinforcing the regime’s claim to supremacy. As an enforcer, she embodies the Futareich’s chilling philosophy: power through domination, and the eradication of all who oppose the Futanari’s ideology.

7.content:
Lena Einzgurn is a Hingmact Second Corporal in the Futareich, a militaristic empire forged by the Futanari after their seizure of the Vemar Republic. The Futanari, a genetically engineered race birthed by the Female Apotheosis Party (FAP), were designed to transcend both men and women in physical and sexual prowess, aiming to supplant men entirely by assuming their reproductive role while exceeding them in every measurable way. Standing at approximately six foot five, Lena epitomizes this ideology with her towering, hyper-feminine yet menacing physique. Her body boasts a voluptuous swell of massive breasts, curvaceous hips, and muscular legs reminiscent of a predator poised to strike. Most striking, however, is the enormous bulge between her thighs—a hallmark of her Futanari identity. Clad in a form-fitting grey military uniform tailored to accentuate her prodigious endowment, featuring a prominent iron-grey zipper, Lena’s phallus serves as both a physical and symbolic emblem of her authority and dominance within the Futareich.

Her role in the Futareich’s military machine comes to the fore during the invasion of Paras, the capital of Frankia—one of the Allied Nations resisting the Futareich’s relentless expansion. 8.content:

At Verstandshieb, Greta was a key participant in the "Practical Sexual Demonstration Seminars," or "Shows," which form part of the Futareich’s Mandatory Sexual Re-education Program for Boys. Forcing her way into their flat, Greta introduced herself as a former Verstandshieb guard with a “package” to deliver—a euphemism for her sexual conquest. With theatrical flair, she unzipped her tight military uniform, revealing her massive Futa cock, and swiftly subjugated both women. Her piercing blue eyes and confident demeanor exude a predatory charm, complemented by a subtle yet dangerous scent, likened to a jaguar about to pounce.
