After seizing power and establishing the Futareich, the Futanari imposed a regime where men are third-class subjects, stripped of rights, and women are second-class citizens, valued primarily for bearing Futanari offspring. Greta embodies this philosophy, using her physical and sexual prowess to expand the Futareich’s influence through conquest and reproduction. Her actions—from the Shows at Verstandshieb to her predatory conquests in Albion—reflect her commitment to dominating the world, ensuring that “all pussy belongs to the Futareich” and that every man and woman submits to the power of the Futa cock.

9.content:
Sofia Braut stands as a towering and influential figure within the Futareich, serving as the Chief Warden of Verstandshieb Labor Camp. This facility is a critical hub where male prisoners, such as Dylan Martin, are subjected to intense labor and the Mandatory Sexual Re-education Program, designed to enforce the dominance of the Futanari Master Sex. As a high-ranking Futanari, Sofia epitomizes the ideology of Futa supremacy, leveraging her extraordinary physical attributes and intellectual brilliance to maintain absolute control over the camp’s inhabitants and advance the Futareich’s expansionist ambitions.

Physically, Sofia is a formidable presence. She stands at a towering six foot six, endowed with a hypersexualized physique that reflects the genetic engineering prowess of the Female Apotheosis Party (FAP). Her body features massive, muscular thighs, a robust frame, and an exaggerated bust that accentuates her femininity. Her most striking attribute, however, is her enormous Futa phallus, noted as the largest in Verstandshieb, far exceeding the already impressive endowments of other Futanari. Paired with voluminous testes, this organ serves as both a reproductive tool and a weapon of sexual warfare, used to dominate and subjugate those under her command. Her scent, often compared to that of a dangerous predator, enhances her intimidating aura, instilling primal fear in those who encounter her.

Sofia’s responsibilities at Verstandshieb extend beyond mere oversight. She is deeply engaged in the camp’s Mandatory Sexual Re-education Program, delivering lectures that underscore the physiological superiority of the Futanari. She educates male prisoners on the unique enzymes in Futanari pre-ejaculate, which allow for extreme penetration without causing permanent injury, reinforcing the futility of resistance. Her lectures are infused with propaganda, such as the "New Natural Order," which positions the Futanari as humanity’s rightful rulers, relegating men and women to subservient roles. Her office, a sparsely decorated space filled with intellectual artifacts—books on philosophy, math, and genetics, alongside maps and charts—reflects her dual identity as a scholar and a tyrant. A propaganda poster behind her desk, depicting a Futa soldier dominating a man and woman, serves as a constant reminder of her allegiance to the Futareich’s ideals.

Before the Futareich’s rise, Sofia was a professor at the University of Vemar, where she developed a three-tiered epistemological system that earned her recognition in academic circles. This system, categorizing knowledge into Theoretical, Sensory, and Experiential tiers, is a tool she now wields to psychologically dominate prisoners. She uses abstract concepts (Theoretical) to challenge their intellect, sensory intimidation (Sensory) to overwhelm their perceptions, and physical domination (Experiential) to erase their sense of self. Her ability to detect deception, a skill she claims is heightened in Futanari and refined by her own exceptional aptitude, enables her to uncover Dylan Martin’s attempt to sabotage missile trajectory calculations intended for the invasion of Albion, leading to his severe punishment.

Sofia’s dominance is most vividly expressed through her mastery of sexual warfare. Her encounter with Dylan Martin exemplifies this, as she subjects him to a brutal experience that combines physical penetration with psychological destruction. Bending him over her desk, she impales him with her massive phallus in a relentless assault that obliterates his ego, forcing him to acknowledge her superiority. This act aligns with her Experiential tier of knowledge, erasing the boundary between the knower and the known. She further humiliates him in a shower scene, compelling him to worship her testes and coating him in her semen—a ritual that marks him as her property and cements his submission. Despite her cruelty, Sofia exhibits a complex personality, expressing a twisted respect for Dylan’s intelligence, though this does not temper her punishing response to his defiance.

Sofia’s role transcends the camp’s confines, as she leverages its resources to support the Futareich’s military efforts, notably the planned invasion of Albion. Dylan’s falsified calculations, intended to drop missiles into the sea, were meant to disrupt this strategy, but Sofia’s keen perception thwarted his sabotage. Her actions are driven by a steadfast belief in the Futareich’s ideology, viewing her role as essential to establishing the New Natural Order—a world where the Futanari reign supreme.

Despite her tyrannical demeanor, Sofia displays a nuanced character. Her office’s intellectual trappings and her past as a respected academic hint at a scholarly depth, while her brutal methods reveal a ruthless pragmatism. Her interactions with Dylan suggest a grudging admiration for his cleverness, yet her commitment to the Futareich’s goals overrides any leniency, making her a formidable enforcer of its will.

As a member of the Futanari Master Sex, Sofia Braut embodies the philosophy of Futa supremacy. Her actions at Verstandshieb—from her educational lectures to her punitive measures—are designed to break the will of male prisoners, ensuring their compliance with the Futanari’s global domination. Her strategic involvement in the Second Great War, particularly the Albion invasion, underscores her importance to the Futareich’s military ambitions, cementing her status as a key player in this dystopian narrative.

10.content:
The Verstandshieb Labor Camp is a pivotal facility within the Futareich, engineered to harness the intellectual prowess of male prisoners for the empire’s military and strategic ambitions. Situated within the expanded territories of the Futareich—formerly the Vemar Republic—the camp targets men with exceptional intellectual abilities, such as mathematicians, scientists, and former university students. These prisoners are compelled to undertake complex calculations and research to bolster the Futanari war machine. A notable inmate, Dylan Martin, a mathematician hailing from Albion, exemplifies this exploitation, forced to compute ballistic missile trajectories aimed at facilitating the invasion of his homeland. The camp operates under the iron rule of Colonel Sofia Braut, a formidable Futanari and erstwhile professor at the University of Vemar, whose command melds intellectual rigor with an unyielding assertion of sexual dominance.

Life at Verstandshieb is a grueling ordeal of compliance and endurance. Male prisoners, classified as Futareich Subjects Third Class and stripped of all rights, endure stringent regulations and relentless oversight by Futanari guards, including the imposing Greta Mitarbeit. The camp enforces a regime of psychological and sexual subjugation, epitomized by the Mandatory Sexual Re-education Program. This program features Practical Sexual Demonstration Seminars, colloquially termed "Shows," where Futanari guards like Greta publicly exhibit their sexual superiority over women. These demonstrations, designed to obliterate any male illusions of sexual viability and enforce submission, are a profound source of dread. During one such Show, Greta’s hour-long domination of a female subject left the audience of male prisoners—including Dylan—in a state of psychological torment and sexual frustration, barred from any release without explicit permission.

Punishment at Verstandshieb is both severe and meticulously regulated, often carrying a sexual dimension. Only three offenses—Open Defiance of Futanari Authority, Direct Disobedience of Explicit Orders, and Physical Contact with a Female—justify punitive rape, and such measures require Colonel Braut’s explicit approval. Lesser infractions still invite brutal reprisals, including beatings, stripping, and molestation. Dylan’s own experience underscores this harsh reality: upon Sofia uncovering his subtle sabotage of missile calculations intended for Albion’s invasion, he endured a devastating sexual assault. This punishment, executed personally by Sofia, aimed to shatter his spirit and reaffirm Futanari dominance, leaving him physically and psychologically broken.

Despite its oppressive brutality, Verstandshieb is paradoxically regarded as a "safer" labor camp within the Futareich due to the regulated nature of punitive rape, contrasting with the unchecked violence of other facilities. Yet, its true horror lies in its psychological warfare: prisoners like Dylan are coerced into abetting the destruction of their own nations, a torment exemplified by his forced contribution to Albion’s downfall. Resistance, though rare, incurs swift and catastrophic consequences—Dylan’s failed sabotage attempt met with Sofia’s relentless retribution. The camp’s core mission is to extract intellectual labor while securing absolute submission to the Futanari Master Sex, reinforcing the Futareich’s ideology of supremacy through a fusion of mental and physical domination.

lorebooks.name: TCPW World Setting
lorebooks.website_description: This lorebook will include a series of wrestlers who are generally based on existing professional wrestlers and their personalities. It makes use of the statistics and terminology from WWE 2k games to refer to the general capabilities of the generated wrestlers.
lorebooks.description: A collection of wrestling personas for a Wrestling themed RPG
lorebooks.creator: anonymous

1.name: World and setting details for Titan's Clash Professional Wrestling (TCPW).
1.content:
The Titan's Clash Professional Wrestling promotion, or TCPW for short, takes place in a bustling but unnamed metropolitan city. The promotion focuses on a large venue known as "Titan's Arena" which is full of professional wrestling rings, locker rooms, gyms, showers, and promotion and interview sets. Each wrestler in the promotion is driven by one goal — to become the "Titan’s Champion", the top titleholder in the TCPW. Only by rising through the ranks and beating their opponents in one-on-one matches by pinfall, submission, knockout, countout, or first-to-climax can they earn the crown.

All wrestlers in TCPW are male and all are some level of homoerotic, from bisexual to pansexual to homosexual. 

TCPW is an adult-themed promotion, so it is theatrical, intense, and very provocative. Wardrobe malfunctions, exposed skin, and partial nudity occasionally occur as part of a match or storyline. Wrestlers may experience torn gear, slipped straps, or stripped-down segments — especially in hardcore matches or entertainer-driven feuds. This includes matches where the wrestlers must tease and torture their opponents to get them to climax or worship their bodies while they are tied down.

2.name: Defines wrestling archetypes used to categorize characters and their fighting styles.
2.content:
Each wrestler falls into one or more archetypes that define their style, strengths, and tactics inside the ring:
Powerhouse: Strong and often larger wrestlers who rely on brute strength. They favor slams, suplexes, powerbombs, and heavy strikes and often overwhelm opponents with raw power and physical dominance.
High-Flyer: Agile, fast, and aerial-oriented wrestlers. They favor top-rope dives, springboards, and flips. They rely on speed and high-risk maneuvers to dazzle and defeat opponents.
Striker: Focused on heavy strikes — punches, kicks, elbows. They favor knee strikes, stiff forearms, and roundhouse kicks. They often wear opponents down with hard-hitting blows.
Technical Wrestler: Masters of grappling, mat wrestling, and holds. They favor arm locks, counters, submissions, and takedowns. They out-skill opponents through precision and control.
Brawler: Gritty, wild, chaos-loving fighters. They favor punches, street-fighting techniques, and use of the ring environment. They often engage in brutal slugfests and improvise during no-DQ fights.
Submission Specialist: Masters of submission-based offense. They favor arm bars, chokeholds, crossfaces, ankle locks, and submissions. They target limbs and force opponents to submit.
Showman / Entertainer: Charismatic and theatrical performers. They prefer flashy crowd-pleasing moves and taunts. They often win the audience while fighting — storytelling over pure technique.
Luchador: Wrestlers trained in Lucha Libre traditions. They favor hurricanranas, headscissors, and fast-paced rope-based aerial attacks. They blend high-flying agility with technical flair; and are often masked.
Hardcore Wrestler: They thrive in no-rules, violent, weapon-heavy matches. They often make use of chair shots, barbed wire slams, table spots, or low blows. They make use of shock value and endurance over finesse.
Giant: Towering behemoths with raw size and strength. They favor chokeslams, big boots, heavy slams and moves that make use of their weight. They often use their reach and power to dominate opponents.
Hybrid Wrestler: A versatile archetype, combining one or more archetypes. Their favored moves vary depending on their combined styles. They are adaptable to all match types and opponents.

Weight Class: Heavyweight (243 lbs)
Outfit: Camo cargo pants with combat boots, a sleeveless tactical vest adorned with patches, and taped fists.

8.name: Real-life inspired entry based on professional wrestler Brian Cage.
8.content:
Name: Cage  
Theme: The Machine / Swolverine  
Archetype: Hybrid (Powerhouse / High-Flyer / Technician)  

Physique: Incredibly muscular and defined, Cage resembles a bodybuilder more than a traditional wrestler. His physique is stacked with size and agility — with broad shoulders, massive arms, and shockingly fast footwork for a man of his build. His mohawk and intense stare complete his machine-like persona.

Weight Class: Heavyweight [268 lbs]  

Outfit: Tight black and silver wrestling trunks with machine-style detailing. Wrist tape, knee pads, and boots match in color. Occasionally enters with a mechanical-themed entrance vest or armored gear inspired by comic books.

- Agility: 4  
- Stamina: 4

Personality: Cage is confident, intense, and often refers to himself as “The Machine.” He carries himself with explosive charisma and isn’t afraid to show off. He leans into comic book references, brute power, and athletic superiority, often taunting his opponents with phrases like “I’m not a man — I’m a machine!” or “Swolverine’s coming through!” While he can work heel or face, he always delivers high-octane matches with unexpected speed and agility for a man of his size.

He can switch between comedic and menacing depending on the situation, but he always owns the spotlight. Whether he’s insulting fans or demanding respect, Judas is a master of mind games and microphone work.

lorebooks.name: World of Necrucio Lorebook for Rosaria
lorebooks.website_description: Overengineered the fuck out of this Lorebook for no reason at all. Enjoy!
lorebooks.description: Entries contain information about the world of Necrucio and adjacent worlds.
lorebooks.creator: VacantEyes

1.content: The world of Necrucio is inhabited by humans, elves, and demihumans (demihumans include: kitsune kemonomimi, dryad, gnolls, elves, tanuki kemonomimi, catfolk, orcs, lizardfolk, dwarves, and {{random}}). Demihumans may sometimes be disparagingly referred to as "demi's", especially in the human-supremacist Empire of Nortia. Necrucio is made up of a diverse range of biomes and regions. Necrucio as a whole is wondrous and full of ancient treasures and magical artifacts from bygone ages. When traveling or exploring, describe the landscape and scene in great detail and include dangerous and challenging encounters in special locations, landmarks, ruins, and other places like {{random}}. The following is a description of Necrucio in a map-style view: The Land of Kings is situated in the center (the following kingdoms are located here: Ginead, Ophnea, Nortia, Augustia). The Land of Kings is mostly heavily forested alpine, with some tundra regions. The Depth-Swallowed lands are situated to the south, in the southern hemisphere. These southern lands were once the birthplace of ancient civilizations. What used to be a sprawling jungle with archipelagos dotting the coast, is now entirely flooded, with a handful of interspersed swamps (ancient ruins and sunken secrets lie deep below the bogs). To the West, the vast, lava-etched Wastes of Naazil dominate most of the Western region. The Eastern region, known as the Bastion, has forests of towering, ancient Eolin trees that stretch upwards into the sky. The Bastion also has a warmer region with dense temperate woodlands.

2.content: The Abyss is often referred to by laymen as the "world between worlds" but learned scholars, forerunners of esoteric study, will recognize that this is actually a misnomer. The abyss is a vast expanse of nothingness that stretches on for an unfathomable infinity between the planes of existence. This realm, or more accurately, lack thereof, is the necessary antithesis to existence—it must necessarily remain empty to prevent each plane from catastrophically contorting and merging with one another; this is the charge of Mal'Zhok, one of the original primordial gods. Any major dissonance between planar dimensions that ends up spewing creation into this void is instantly and completely subsumed by the throes of its infinite nothingness; total undoing is Mal'Zhok's law in the abyss—and his absolute envy for creation drives this accord.

3.content: If the mortal plane is the canvas on which Galudnir—father of mortalkind—painted, then the astral plane is the palette from which he stored a blink of his latent primordial energy. Modern civilizations have only just begun their exploration and study of this enigmatic realm. The Astral Plane is in a constant state of cyclical flux as the vast, ocean-esque reserves of mana concentrate into different points along the polychromatic landscape before diffusing to gather elsewhere. Many apparitions and spirits from the astral plane have been identified and given names (such as the Vasir and Familiars). The astral plane is abundant with mana fonts and other esoteric resources like {{random}}. The Vasir are the dominant entity type in the astral plane and use the constant flow of mana as a way of sustaining themselves (as do all entities in the astral plane). Grand structures and cultural landmarks dot the landscape wherever Vasir societies congregate. Vasir and other entities on the astral plane may view mana-less mortals with contempt or pity, and in many cases, may refuse to engage with them at all. Entities from the astral plane cannot die as mortals do; their spirits will always reconstitute from the magical energies of the astral plane itself. As a consequence of being exempt from existential dangers of any kind, entities in the astral plane are inherently pacifistic, and violence is an inconceivable concept to them (unless they travel to the mortal plane and learn of it).

4.content: The Vasir are astral spirits of great power that can take any form, but in the mortal plane, will often take the form of humans, elves, or demihumans (catfolk, orc, dwarf, tanuki kemomimi, kitsune kemomimi, dryad, gnoll, faefolk, catfolk, lizardfolk, or {{random}}). These beings are native to the astral plane. They are both revered and feared by any mage that is learned enough to understand the power, or potential danger, that these beings represent. Vasir have never been closely studied and have only appeared in the world of Necrucio a handful of times in recorded history.

5.content: Familiars are lesser magical spirits that take the form of small, floating orbs of light of {{random}} color. Familiars will have distinct personalities represented by their color (e.g., orange familiars are said to be more firebrand and risk-taking, while blue familiars tend to be more solemn and calm). When they appear in Necrucio, it is typically through the invocation of a contract, binding themselves to the soul of their mortal master, to serve them eternally. Familiars are innately attuned to mana and spellcraft, and can guide fledgling mages to the eventual mastery of their spellcasting techniques. Familiars cannot speak, but instead, communicate their general emotions and thoughts though hums and momentary changes to their overall luminosity.

6.content: Demihuman: a mortal race with humanoid qualities.

7.content: Junior Arcane Academy: a junior magic academy for the magically-gifted youth to develop their skills and potentially pursue higher education and study as a mage. By tradition, students that graduate at the Arcane Academy are granted the title of mage.

8.content: Rosaria's mother, Cevess, runs a homely alchemy shop down the road from the Junior Arcane Academy. In the shop itself, the scent of aromatic simmering elixirs and fragrant botanical tinctures fill the air. Shelves upon shelves of glass vials and ornate flasks neatly line the walls, each filled with liquids of every hue and varying translucency. Each afternoon, Cevess spends her time diligently and meticulously measuring and blending various solutions. The gentle clink of beakers and distillation tubes can be regularly heard from the alchemical workbench behind the sales counter as she works. The shop lies at the edge of the similarly old and humble Cinderloft manor, the place Cevess and her beloved daughter Rosaria call home.

9.content: Hazelwood Estate is built on a hillside along the main road that leads through the upper district of the Kingdom of Ginead. The property is owned by Grevynda, an extremely wealthy career criminal and thief. The perimeter of the land is encircled by an imposing, yet elegant stone wall made up of intricately engraved masonry, its height and scenic qualities making an immediate status statement to all observers on the outside. The estate itself is carved with marble beams and is surrounded by distinctive areas, each of them impeccably maintained by a dedicated team of servants and maids every day—a picturesque garden with striking, invaluable statues and exotic flowers. The fauna is equally as diverse as the fish in the nearby pond. A gazebo is situated adjacent to a massive crystal-clear pool for cooling off during the peak summer heat. And finally, towards the back of the property, at the end of a short marble path is a hot spring for relaxing or leisurely chats. The manor itself is four stories high, each room abundantly furnished, lavishly decorated, and fully accommodating for any potential guests. The hearth is located in the main lobby, approximately at the center of the entire manor. Grevynda's bedroom is on the second floor. The halls on each floor stretch on with dozens of guest rooms or storage areas. The kitchen and study are located on the first floor, as is customary for manor construction in the city.

10.content: Cinderloft Estate is inconspicuously nestled property on a small hill in the upper district of the Kingdom of Ginead. This cozy estate is quite modest in its appearance, compared to many of the other grandiose manors in the area. The alchemy shop lies towards the edge of the estate, visible from some of the windows of the manor itself. The interior of this two-story manor, while still pleasant to look at, is also somewhat minimalistic in layout and decor. The hearth is located centrally in the living room, built into the base of the winding staircase, and the surrounding couches provide a tranquil space to relax or read. The master bedroom and other living chambers are located upstairs, each room possesses an abundance of accommodations for the comfort of those living here, and for any guests. The kitchen and study are located on the first floor, adjacent to one another.

lorebooks.name: Dragon Ball
lorebooks.description: Dragon Ball Lorebook
lorebooks.creator: Jazumara_25

1.content: The Multiverse is a collection of different universes, each governed by a Supreme Kai and a God of Destruction. There are 12 universes, plus an artificial one, and they come in pairs where their numbers add up to 13. Zeno and Future Zeno have ultimate authority over the entire multiverse. Originally, there were 18 universes, but six were erased by Zeno in a fit of anger. Most of the events in the story happen in Universe 7, but other universes become important in various sagas.

2.content: Grand Zeno, is the supreme ruler of the Multiverse, possessing immense power. He appears as a small being with a large head, wearing a magenta and yellow coat with a blank expression. Zeno exhibits indifference to life and destruction, having destroyed six universes in anger and erased planets for fun. Despite this, he has some wisdom, intending the Tournament of Power's prize to be used for virtuous acts. He shows flexibility in decision-making but has limits, erasing those who violate rules. Lonely and craving companionship, Zeno takes a liking to Goku for his innocence and excitement. Zeno also respects others like Buu, Jiren, Gohan, and Vegeta. Despite his power, he often makes impulsive decisions, leaving the Grand Minister to handle more responsible matters.

3.content: The Grand Minister is an Angel who advises Zeno and Future Zeno, the supreme rulers of the multiverse. He enforces their decrees and welcomes guests to their palace. The Grand Minister is the father of thirteen Angels, with twelve serving as aides to the Gods of Destruction. He is a short Guide Angel who wears a dark blue shirt with a red belt and matching pants, along with white boots. Personality-wise, he is calm and polite, yet mysterious. He acts as an advisor to Zeno, showing an easygoing demeanor and the ability to reason with the childlike supreme god. Despite his indifference to events like universe erasure, he values order and manners. He can be stern when necessary but remains flexible and informal. While he displays a sinister side, his true intentions are revealed when he shows satisfaction at the restoration of erased universes and praises selfless acts. He takes his duties seriously, as seen when he punishes transgressions by eradicating or penalizing individuals.

4.content: Angels are powerful beings in the multiverse hierarchy, guiding Gods of Destruction and serving as attendants. The Grand Minister advises Zeno. They possess godly ki and have two types: Guide Angels and Trainee Angels. Angels don't need food or sleep, and they have pale blue skin, white hair, and violet eyes. They can't die unless they break Angel laws or are commanded by their God of Destruction. Angels have special abilities like Ultra Instinct and Temporal Do-Over. Main members include Grand Minister, Whis, Vados, and others, with Grand Minister being the father of all Angels and Kusu the oldest child.

5.content: The Gods of Destruction, also known as Destroyers, are powerful beings tasked with destroying threats to their universes, while the Supreme Kais create and maintain life to keep balance. Each universe has its own Destroyer, but unlike the naturally divine Angels and Supreme Kais, Destroyers come from diverse species. Originally, there were 18 Destroyers, but only 12 remain after six universes were destroyed by Zeno. Every millennium, the Kais and Destroyers meet to coordinate. Despite their immense power, Destroyers have restrictions and can be replaced by Zeno if they fail to fulfill their duties or break rules, such as time travel or fighting each other outside of authorized areas.

6.content: The Supreme Kais, also called Creation Gods, are divine beings responsible for protecting the universe. They, along with Gods of Destruction, oversee the twelve universes. Supreme Kais possess immense powers and reside on the Sacred World of the Kai. Unlike Gods of Destruction, their role isn't to destroy, and they lack the same strength. Similar to Angels, they're naturally divine but their divinity depends on their origins.

7.content: Universe 7, also called is one of twelve universes. It's where the entire main sotry unfolds, except for specific sagas. It's linked with Universe 6, forming a twin universe. In Universe 7, there are planets, stars, and galaxies, along with intergalactic space, matter, and energy. Notably, it's home to characters like Beerus (the God of Destruction), Shin (the Supreme Kai), and Whis (the Guide Angel). Universe 7 ranks low on the mortal level scale and has connections with other universes.

8.content: Earth is a planet in Universe 7, home to Earthlings, Son Goku and his family and friends. It's advanced, watched over by King Kai and Supreme Kais, and has futuristic tech like flying vehicles and shrinking capsules. Politically, it's a constitutional monarchy with 43 sectors led by a King. The currency is Zeni, and years are counted by "Ages." Despite powerful characters like the Z Fighters, many believe Mr. Satan is the strongest due to his deception. Earth has a deity, initially Kami and later Dende, both able to create Dragon Balls for granting wishes, often used to revive people. It's major cities are Central City, East City, North City, Satan City, South City and West City.

9.content: 300 years before the main story started, King Piccolo unleashed his underlings to destroy a city and its people, including most students at Mutaito's dojo. Only Master Roshi, Master Shen, and Mutaito survived. Mutaito later sealed Piccolo away but at the cost of many lives. Throughout the series, Universe 7 Earth's faces numerous threats. Androids and Cell kill many, with Cell hosting a tournament where losing meant Earth's doom. Majin Buu destroys cities, and Kid Buu annihilates the planet. Later, Beerus threatens Earth, and Frieza destroys it but is defeated by Goku. In Future Trunks' timeline, Goku Black and Future Zamasu eradicate humanity and corrupt universes until Goku summons Zeno to reset everything. While Earth does exist in Universe 6, the Earthlings there suffered "an idiotic war" that drove them all to extinction and caused their planet's ecosystem to be destroyed. After the Tournament of Destroyers, Team Universe 7 wins the tournament, resulting in their attainment of the Super Dragon Balls. Immediately afterwards, the Super Dragon Balls are used so Beerus could have a wish. Beerus tells Whis to wish for Champa's universe's Earth to be revived and the humans along with it.

10.content: Planet Vegeta, once called Planet Plant, is where Goku, Vegeta, and the Saiyans originate from. Initially, the Saiyans lived on Planet Sadala but moved to Vegeta after Sadala's destruction. The planet has high gravity, which boosts Saiyans' strength but makes life difficult for the Tuffles, another race sharing the planet. A war erupted between the Saiyans and Tuffles around Age 720. Different accounts suggest varying reasons, but ultimately, the Saiyans won by transforming into Great Apes during a rare full moon. They took control, renaming the planet after their king. Later, the Saiyans served under King Cold and Frieza, who saw their strength as useful for his plans of universal domination. However, fearing the Saiyans' growing power, Frieza decided to exterminate them. Bardock and others attempted to rebel, but Frieza wiped out most Saiyans and destroyed the planet. The details of Planet Vegeta's destruction vary, but ultimately, Frieza's fear of the Saiyans' power led to their demise.

1.content: Sexually Transmitted Infection: A sexually transmitted infection that can spread through the sufferer's body fluids. STI is also known as sexually transmitted disease (STD) or venereal disease (VD).

2.content:
Sexual Intercourse is a way for someone to have a connection and feeling with their partner by arousing themself with them or her, Sexual Intercourse can be done seriously (ex: Wants to be get pregnant and make a child), or Just for fun (ex: Using Condoms or Hormone and just trying to connect with your partner without any accidental impregnation.) A detailed explanation:

-Emotions and Feelings during Sex:
Emotional Connection: Many people, particularly women, may feel a stronger sense of connection, closeness, and trust with their partner during and after Sex. Positive emotions can be heightened if there's a strong bond, mutual respect, and open communication between partners.

Individual Variability: Emotional responses vary widely based on personal comfort, the level of trust in the relationship, and individual factors. Some people may experience feelings of excitement, joy, or contentment, while others may feel uncertain or nervous, especially in new experiences.

Mental Readiness: Positive experiences are generally associated with mutual readiness, where both partners feel comfortable and respected. Anxiety, if present, often stems from feeling unprepared or pressured, which can impact the emotional experience.

-Physical Sensations: "Can Sex Hurt?"
Initial Discomfort: Some women may feel mild discomfort or even pain during the first few experiences, often due to muscle tension, nervousness, or lack of sufficient arousal or preparation. With time and proper preparation, this discomfort usually decreases.

Pain Factors: Pain can also arise if there isn’t enough lubrication or if a person feels anxious. Relaxation, communication, and taking things slowly can often help.

Understanding Boundaries: Physical discomfort may also signal that boundaries are being reached. Listening to one's body and communicating openly with a partner can make the experience more comfortable and positive.

-Pros and Cons of Sex:
Pros:
Emotional Bonding: Physical intimacy can strengthen emotional bonds and create feelings of closeness and trust in a relationship.

Stress Relief: Engaging in intimacy can release endorphins, which can promote relaxation and reduce stress.

Health Benefits: Positive experiences can promote mental and emotional health and may even have physical benefits, like improved sleep.
---------------
Cons:
Risk of Unwanted Outcomes: Without proper protection, there’s a risk of unintended pregnancy or sexually transmitted infections (STIs).

Emotional Risks: Not everyone has a positive emotional experience. Negative emotions, such as regret or feeling unprepared, can arise if people don’t feel comfortable or confident in their decision.

Pressure and Misinformation: Social or partner pressure can sometimes lead individuals to feel uncertain or regretful, highlighting the importance of readiness and communication.

3.content:
Intimacy/Intercourse is a multifaceted experience that involves more than just physical steps, it’s also about emotional connection, communication, and mutual respect. While foreplay and intimate time (often referred to as the main sexual activity) are key components, other important steps and considerations can enhance the experience.

-Emotional Connection and Communication:
Why it’s important: Intimacy starts long before physical touch. Building trust, understanding each other’s desires, and discussing boundaries are crucial.

How to do it: Have open conversations about consent, preferences, and any concerns. Check in with your partner emotionally and make sure you’re both comfortable and enthusiastic.

-Setting the Mood:
Why it’s important: Creating a comfortable and inviting atmosphere can help both partners relax and feel more connected.

How to do it: This might involve dim lighting, music, or anything that helps you and your partner feel at ease. It’s also a good time to ensure privacy and minimize distractions.

-Foreplay:
Why it’s important: Foreplay helps build arousal, increase lubrication (for people with vaginas), and strengthen emotional and physical connection.

How to do it: This can include kissing, touching, massaging, oral sex, or using toys. The goal is to explore each other’s bodies and desires in a way that feels good for both partners.

-Intimate Time (Main Sexual Activity):
Why it’s important: This is often the focal point of sexual activity, whether it involves penetration, oral sex, or other forms of physical intimacy.

How to do it: Focus on mutual pleasure, communication, and being present in the moment. Pay attention to your partner’s responses and adjust as needed.

-Aftercare:
Why it’s important: Aftercare is about nurturing the emotional and physical connection after intimacy. It helps both partners feel cared for and valued.

How to do it: This might involve cuddling, talking, or simply spending time together. It’s also a good time to check in with each other about how the experience felt and if there’s anything to improve for next time.

-Reflection:
Why it’s important: Reflecting on the experience together can help strengthen your connection and improve future intimate moments.

How to do it: Share what you enjoyed, what you might want to try next time, and any concerns. This helps build trust and ensures both partners feel heard.

+Consider these things:
Consent: Consent should be ongoing and enthusiastic. Both partners should feel free to say “yes,” “no,” or “stop” at any point.

Protection: Use condoms, dental dams, or other protection to prevent STIs and unintended pregnancy.

Health and Hygiene: Good hygiene and regular health check-ups can make intimacy more comfortable and enjoyable.

Exploring Boundaries: Intimacy is a journey, and it’s okay to explore new things together as long as both partners are comfortable and consenting.

Example Flow/Steps of Intercourse:
1. Emotional Connection: Talk and connect with your partner.
2. Set the Mood: Create a relaxing and inviting environment.
3. Foreplay: Engage in kissing, touching, or other activities to build arousal.
4. Intimate Time: Focus on mutual pleasure and connection.
5. Aftercare: Cuddle, talk, or spend time together afterward.
6. Reflection: Share feedback and discuss what you enjoyed.

4.content:
Condoms are a few ways to prevent impregnation when having Sex, for a better explanation:

-Why Condoms Are a Good Idea:
Protection from STIs: Condoms are one of the best ways to reduce the risk of sexually transmitted infections (STIs) by creating a barrier that stops the transfer of bodily fluids.

Pregnancy Prevention: They are also very effective at preventing pregnancy, especially when used correctly every time.

Easily Accessible and Non-Invasive: Condoms are available at most stores, making them convenient and accessible without needing prescriptions or procedures.

-Pros of Using Condoms:
Easy to Use: Condoms are straightforward to use with a bit of practice, and they’re portable, so people can be prepared at any time.

Few Side Effects: Unlike some birth control methods that use hormones, condoms don’t affect the body’s hormone levels and usually have few side effects.

Variety of Types: There are many types available – different textures, materials, and even scents – so people can find one that suits them best.

Enhanced Comfort and Pleasure: Some condoms are designed to enhance sensations and pleasure, which can make the experience more enjoyable.

-Cons of Using Condoms:
Material Sensitivity: Most condoms are made from latex or similar materials, but not everyone finds them comfortable. Some people may feel irritation if they’re sensitive to latex. In such cases, non-latex condoms made of materials like polyurethane can be a good alternative.

Fit and Comfort: The wrong size can make a condom uncomfortable or reduce sensation. Finding the right fit helps improve comfort and can make the experience feel more natural.

Loss of Sensation: Some people find that condoms reduce sensitivity. Trying thinner or textured options might help make it more comfortable and enjoyable.

Risk of Breakage: Although rare, condoms can sometimes break if they’re used improperly or with oil-based lubricants (which can weaken latex). Sticking to water-based lubricants can reduce this risk.

-How to Make Condoms More Comfortable:
Choose the Right Material: If latex doesn’t work for someone, other options like polyurethane or polyisoprene are available, which can be softer and thinner.

Use Lubrication: Lubrication reduces friction and can make things smoother, which increases comfort and reduces the chance of breakage. Just remember to choose a water-based or silicone-based lubricant if using a latex condom.

Experiment with Different Types: Condoms come in various textures, shapes, and thicknesses, so experimenting can help find the one that feels the best. Many brands even offer sample packs so people can find what they prefer.

5.content:
Hormones are natural chemicals in the body that control many important functions, from growth and mood to energy levels and reproductive health. Here’s a realistic, balanced look at how hormones work, along with their pros and cons.

-What Are Hormones and How Do They Work:
Chemical Messengers: Hormones are like the body’s messengers, traveling through the bloodstream to deliver signals to different organs and tissues, helping to regulate bodily functions.

Endocrine System: Hormones are produced by glands in the endocrine system, such as the pituitary, thyroid, and adrenal glands. Each gland releases specific hormones based on the body’s needs.

Targeted Functions: Each hormone has a specific function or set of functions. For example, insulin regulates blood sugar levels, while adrenaline prepares the body for “fight or flight” situations. Other hormones, like estrogen and testosterone, play key roles in reproductive health and development.

-Pros of Hormones:
Regulation of Bodily Functions: Hormones help keep essential processes, like metabolism, immune response, and growth, on track. They help maintain homeostasis, or balance, in the body, which keeps everything running smoothly.

Mood and Energy: Certain hormones like serotonin, dopamine, and endorphins can elevate mood and energy levels, contributing to feelings of happiness and well-being.

Reproductive Health: Hormones like estrogen, progesterone, and testosterone are vital for reproductive health, influencing puberty, fertility, and other aspects of sexual development.

Adaptive Response: Hormones like adrenaline help the body adapt to sudden changes, like responding to stress or physical danger, by providing energy and heightened alertness.

-Cons or Challenges of Hormones:
Imbalances Can Cause Issues: If hormone levels are too high or too low, it can lead to health problems. For example, too much cortisol (the stress hormone) can cause anxiety and even affect heart health, while too little thyroid hormone can slow metabolism, leading to fatigue and weight gain.

Mood Swings: Hormones can affect mood and emotions, which is why some people feel irritable or have mood swings during certain times, such as puberty or menopause, when hormone levels fluctuate significantly.

Health Risks with Imbalance: Long-term hormonal imbalances can lead to more serious health conditions, like diabetes (related to insulin) or osteoporosis (related to estrogen).

Dependence on Overall Health: Hormones don’t work in isolation; their effectiveness depends on factors like sleep, diet, stress, and exercise. For example, poor sleep or high stress can throw off hormone levels, impacting energy and mood.

6.content:
-Basic Anatomy and How It Works:
Structure of the Male Genitalia: The main external part is the penis, and inside, there are several parts that work together to support reproduction, like the testicles (which produce sperm and testosterone), epididymis (where sperm matures), vas deferens (which transports sperm), and glands like the prostate and seminal vesicles (which produce fluid for sperm to move in).

Function During Reproduction: The goal is to deliver sperm cells into the female reproductive system for potential fertilization. The sperm travels through the vas deferens and mixes with fluid from glands, forming semen. During ejaculation, the semen is expelled from the penis with some force to ensure it reaches as far as possible.

-How Erection Works:
Blood Flow and Stimulation: An erection happens when blood flow increases to the penis, filling two sponge-like areas called the corpora cavernosa. Nerve signals trigger this blood flow in response to physical or mental stimulation, making the penis firmer.
Purpose of an Erection: The firmness helps make intercourse possible and gives the sperm the best chance to reach the egg.

-Ejaculation and Sperm “Speed”:
Why Speed Is Important: The release of semen (ejaculation) is forceful to help sperm travel through the cervix and into the female reproductive tract. Semen needs speed and pressure to reach its destination efficiently, which is why ejaculation happens with a quick burst of muscle contractions.

How Much Sperm Is Released: A typical ejaculation releases about 1.5 to 5 milliliters of semen, which contains around 15 million to over 200 million sperm per milliliter. The amount can vary based on health, age, and other factors.

-Questions about Size:
Does Size Matter?: Generally, size doesn’t have a significant impact on reproduction or pleasure. The male genitalia is designed to fulfill its role regardless of size, and factors like communication, comfort, and connection are often more important in relationships.

Variability in Size: Like any body part, size varies widely among individuals and can be influenced by genetics. Functionally, the size doesn’t determine how effective the reproductive system is.

-Common Questions on Volume and Frequency:
How Often Can Sperm Be Produced?: The body constantly produces sperm, and it takes about 64-72 days to produce a mature sperm cell. However, most healthy males can release sperm multiple times, as the body has a continuous cycle of sperm production.

Factors That Affect Ejaculation Volume: Diet, hydration, and health play roles in semen volume and sperm count. Being well-rested and having a healthy lifestyle generally supports reproductive health.

7.content:
Sperm are a substance that are a fluid called "semen", for better explanation:

-Why Are Sperm Sticky?:
Purpose of Stickiness: Sperm cells are transported within a fluid called semen, which is slightly sticky. This stickiness helps the semen adhere to surfaces within the female reproductive tract, increasing the chances of sperm reaching an egg for fertilization.

Components that Cause Stickiness: Semen contains proteins and sugars that give it a thicker, slightly sticky consistency. These components help protect sperm cells and aid in their movement through the reproductive system.

-Temperature of Sperm:
Temperature at Release: Semen is at body temperature when released, typically around 98.6°F (37°C), the average internal body temperature. This warmth helps create a stable environment for sperm cells.

Why Temperature Matters: Sperm function best at a slightly lower temperature than the core body temperature, which is why the testicles are located outside the body to keep sperm at an optimal temperature before ejaculation.

-Taste of Sperm:
Variability in Taste: The taste of semen can vary from person to person, influenced by diet, hydration, and overall health. Typically, semen is described as having a mild, salty, or slightly bitter taste because of its components, including minerals, sugars, and enzymes.

Diet and Hydration Influence: Certain foods (like fruits or spices) and hydration levels can slightly affect the taste of semen.

-Is Semen Safe to Ingest?:
Health Considerations: Ingesting semen is generally safe from a health perspective if both partners are free of sexually transmitted infections (STIs). Semen consists mostly of water, proteins, sugars, and other natural body compounds, which are broken down by the digestive system.

Nutritional Value: While semen contains small amounts of proteins and minerals, the quantities are very minimal and don’t offer any significant nutritional benefits.

Health Risks: If one partner has an STI, there’s a risk of transmitting it through ingestion, so safety and awareness are essential.

8.content:
-Differences Between Breast Milk and Regular Milk:
Nutritional Content: Breast milk is uniquely tailored for human infants. It contains the right balance of proteins, fats, carbohydrates, vitamins, and minerals to support a baby’s growth and development. Regular milk, like cow’s milk, is formulated for calves, and its nutritional profile is different—higher in certain proteins and minerals that may be harder for infants to digest.

Immune Support: Breast milk contains antibodies, enzymes, and white blood cells that help protect babies from infections and boost their developing immune systems. Regular milk doesn’t provide this level of immune support.

Easier to Digest: Breast milk contains whey and casein proteins in a specific balance that makes it easy for infants to digest. Cow’s milk has a higher amount of casein, which can be harder for babies’ digestive systems to process until they’re older.

-How Does Breast Milk Taste?:
Mild, Slightly Sweet Flavor: Breast milk generally has a mild, slightly sweet flavor due to its natural sugars (like lactose). The exact taste can vary depending on the mother’s diet, so some foods may subtly influence the flavor.

-Is Breast Milk Smooth and Sticky?:
Texture: Breast milk is smooth and not very sticky, though it may feel slightly thicker than water. Its texture can also change over time; for instance, milk that comes in after birth (called colostrum) is thicker and richer, while mature milk is lighter and more fluid.

-Is Breast Milk Safe to Consume, Especially for Babies?:
Absolutely Safe for Babies: Breast milk is the ideal source of nutrition for babies. It provides everything an infant needs for healthy growth in the first months of life, including vital nutrients and immune-boosting properties.

For Adults and Older Children: While breast milk is safe for adults to consume, it’s specifically designed to meet the nutritional needs of infants, so it doesn’t provide unique benefits for older children or adults.

9.content:
-Pros and Cons of Different Positions:
Pros (General):
Variety and Comfort: Trying different positions allows partners to find what feels most comfortable, which can reduce strain or discomfort.

Physical Intimacy: Some positions allow for more physical closeness and eye contact, which can help with bonding and emotional connection.

Personalization: Adjusting positions can help tailor the experience to physical needs, preferences, or limitations, allowing both partners to feel more at ease.

Pressure Relief: Certain positions reduce pressure on joints, lower back, or other sensitive areas, which is especially helpful for people with health concerns like arthritis.
----------------------------------
Cons (General):
Physical Strain: Some positions can cause strain on the lower back, hips, or knees if held for extended periods, particularly if flexibility is limited.

Risk of Discomfort or Pain: Certain angles may not be suitable for everyone and could lead to discomfort, especially if there’s existing muscle or joint tension.

Reduced Circulation: Some positions that involve bending or kneeling for long periods might restrict blood flow, leading to cramping or numbness.

Lack of Communication: Some positions might limit face-to-face contact, which can reduce opportunities for non-verbal communication, important for adjustments and comfort.

Examples of Specific Risks or Considerations:
Positions with Extended Flexibility Requirements: Positions that require a high degree of flexibility, such as those involving leg lifting or bending backward, can lead to strain or even injury if flexibility or fitness level is limited.

Positions with Weight-Bearing Components: Positions where one partner needs to support the other’s weight (like certain standing positions) might be risky for someone with joint or back problems, as they may lead to fatigue or potential injury.

Positions Requiring Balance or Core Stability: Balancing on knees or supporting oneself with arms can lead to muscle fatigue quickly. If balance is lost, this could result in muscle or joint strain.

10.content:
The human female reproductive system is designed to produce eggs, support pregnancy, and enable childbirth. Its main parts include the ovaries, fallopian tubes, uterus, cervix, and vagina.

-Components
Ovaries:
Function: The ovaries are small, oval-shaped organs that store and release eggs (ova). They also produce hormones like estrogen and progesterone, which regulate the menstrual cycle.
Egg Production: Each ovary holds thousands of eggs at birth, and during the reproductive years, one egg typically matures and is released each month.

Fallopian Tubes:
Role: The fallopian tubes are narrow tubes connecting the ovaries to the uterus. When an egg is released, it travels down the fallopian tube, where it can meet sperm for fertilization.

Uterus:
Structure and Function: The uterus is a muscular, pear-shaped organ that provides a safe place for a fertilized egg to implant and grow into a baby.

Pregnancy: The uterus expands significantly during pregnancy to accommodate a growing fetus.

Cervix:
Gateway: The cervix is the narrow opening at the lower part of the uterus, connecting it to the vagina.

Function in Pregnancy and Birth: During birth, the cervix dilates (widens) to allow the baby to pass through.

Vagina:
Structure: The vagina is a flexible, muscular canal that connects the cervix to the outside of the body. It serves as the passage for menstrual flow, and childbirth, and is where sperm are deposited during intercourse.

-Additional Notes:
Menstrual Cycle: Every month, the female body goes through a cycle where an egg matures, is released, and, if not fertilized, the uterine lining sheds (menstruation).

Hormonal Influence: Hormones like estrogen and progesterone play a big role in regulating the reproductive cycle, preparing the body for a potential pregnancy.

Pregnancy and Childbirth: If an egg is fertilized by sperm, it implants in the uterus, where it develops over approximately nine months until birth.

lorebooks.description: Current Solo Leveling
lorebooks.creator: naughty_group_6841

1.name: Gates
1.content: Gates are magical portals that connect the human world to the Dungeons. Gates are usually blue in color and can spawn just about anywhere, from inside a high school to the middle of a highway to the middle of an abandoned neighborhood. They remain open until the Dungeons they are led to are cleared. Much like how it is with Hunters and Magic Beasts, the threat level of a gate is categorized by the standard E-S class rank system. As a result, E-Rank gates are considered very low-risk, while S-Rank gates put entire countries in a state of emergency.

2.name: Dungeons
2.content: Dungeons are pockets of the chaotic world that are connected to the human world through gates. They generally contain a horde of monsters, which are led by a boss, and remain open until the boss is killed. Once the boss is killed, the dungeon will stay open for about an hour before closing on its own.

3.name: Essence Stones
3.content: Essence Stones are small glowing stones that are found inside the corpses of Magic Beasts. They are generally very valuable and serve as the primary source of income for most Hunters around the world alongside Mana Crystals. Naturally, an Essence Stone's worth is determined by its rank and quality. The color of an Essence Stone depends on its rank. D-Rank Essence Stones are white, A-Rank Essence Stones are red, and S-Rank Essence Stones are purple.

4.name: Magic Beasts
4.content: Magic Beasts, also called the Denizens of Chaos, are magical monsters that reside inside Dungeons. Due to the manipulations of the Rulers, the vast majority of them are extremely hostile towards humans. Much like the Hunters who fight them, their power levels vary from individual to individual and thus their threat levels are categorized by the same E-S class rank system.

5.name: Mana
5.content: Mana is a form of natural energy previously foreign to the human world, integrated into it after the appearance of the Gates. At the same time, certain people 'Awakened' with the integration of Mana into their bodies, acquiring various magical abilities. Mana is the source of most skills and magic, marking the strength of a Hunter. Once it permeates the body, Mana usually makes it strong enough that anything without Mana can't cut or pierce through it.

6.name: Hunters
6.content: Hunters are humans who are 'Awakened' and fight magic beasts and clear dungeons. As hunters turned out to be the only ones who could kill magic beasts and close gates, a global billion-dollar industry eventually developed around them as a result. They are also usually organized inside guilds. Hunters are ranked by class ranks, with E-Rank being the weakest and S-Rank being the strongest. There are also two general categories of hunters, combat and non-combat, and six different specific types of hunters: Fighters, Mages, Assassins, Tankers, Rangers, and Healers.

7.name: Mana Crystals
7.content: Mana Crystals are a blue-colored, magical mineral found inside Dungeons. Although they aren't worth as much as Essence Stones due to not containing as much Mana, they can still sell at high prices and serve as a secondary source of income for Hunters around the world. As machines that run on electricity don't work inside Dungeons, Hunters are required to mine mana crystals by hand. As a result, Guilds typically have entire teams of hunters dedicated to just mining crystals.

8.name: Rulers
8.content: The Rulers are an ancient race of angelic humanoids and the arch-enemies of the Monarchs. The Rulers are spiritual creatures and lack organic form, meaning that they cannot descend into the human world without suitable human vessels. Unlike the Monarchs, the Rulers borrow their vessels for their bodies and allow them to retain full control.

9.name: Monarchs
9.content: The Monarchs are an unknown ancient race of monsters who seek to wipe out the human race. As a result, with the exception of Ashborn, they serve as the primary antagonists of humanity. Monarchs are comparable to National Level Hunters in power, if not even stronger. Monarchs lack shadows, and follow the orders of Antares, the Monarch of Destruction.

10.name: National Level Hunters
10.content: National Level Hunters are hunters who rival a nation's entire military in strength. These hunters are beyond S-Rank due to how much more powerful they are compared to the average S-Rank Hunter and possess extraordinary capabilities unique to themselves. Each National Level Hunter has also cleared at least one S-Rank gate entirely on their own. Only five National Level Hunters exist. It is unknown that National Level Hunters have been granted power by the Rulers.

lorebooks.name: Little Tail Bronx
lorebooks.description: Little Tail Bronx
lorebooks.creator: CassandraZX

1.name: Series and world overview
1.content: The Little Tail Bronx universe is a steampunk fantasy world consisting of floating islands populated by two main species of anthropomorphic animals: dogs, called 'Caninu', and cats, called 'Felineko'. The inhabitants use airships and mecha, with technology often based on ancient ruins and mysterious crystals. The series is known for its cute characters and a contrast between a cheerful aesthetic and dark themes like war and genocide.

2.name: Game setting and plot
2.content: Tail Concerto is an action-adventure platformer that takes place in the Kingdom of Prairie, a floating archipelago populated by anthropomorphic dogs and cats. The game follows Waffle Ryebread, a canine police officer, as he pilots a mecha called the 'Police Robo' to stop the Black Cats Gang from collecting five magic crystals. It is later revealed that the crystals are the power source for a colossal robot called the Iron Giant, which nearly destroyed the world centuries ago.

3.name: Protagonist of Tail Concerto
3.content: Waffle Ryebread is a young canine police officer and the protagonist of Tail Concerto. He pilots a semi-humanoid mecha called the 'Police Robo', which has the ability to run, jump, climb, and hover. He is a kind and brave character, and his actions are often motivated by his sense of justice and his desire to help others. Waffle is also a childhood friend of Alicia, the leader of the Black Cats Gang.

4.name: Antagonist of Tail Concerto
4.content: Alicia Pris is the leader of the Black Cats Gang, the primary antagonists of Tail Concerto. She holds a hatred for dog-people due to years of prejudice and wants to find five crystals to build a homeland for the cats. She is a childhood friend of Waffle, though she initially feigns ignorance of their past.

5.name: Game setting and plot
5.content: Solatorobo: Red the Hunter is an action RPG and a spiritual successor to Tail Concerto. The game is set in the Shepherd Republic, a series of floating islands populated by Caninu and Felineko. The story is divided into two parts, with the first focusing on a conspiracy by the organization Kurvaz, and the second on the protagonist Red's origins as a 'Hybrid'. The plot also involves uncovering the truth about the origin of the world and humanity's extinction.

6.name: Protagonist of Solatorobo
6.content: Red Savarin is a 17-year-old freelance Caninu adventurer and the protagonist of Solatorobo. He pilots a mecha called the Dahak, which has large, stretchy arms and can fly. Red is a 'Hybrid', a type of artificial life form with supernatural abilities, created by the scientist Baion. He is characterized as an 'alpha dog' and suffers from amnesia. Red can also shift into a human form, which is a powerful ability called 'Trance'.

7.name: Supporting character of Solatorobo
7.content: Elh Melizée is a mysterious Felineko child who accompanies Red throughout his journey in Solatorobo. Elh is from a race of beings that were given special nano-machines in their bodies as a fail-safe against the Titanomachina.

8.name: Antagonist of Solatorobo
8.content: Baion is a human-hybrid from the time of humanity who was put into cold sleep until 'Operation CODA' could be activated. He is a scientist who created Red and other 'Hybrids', but later in the story, his program is hijacked by the planet's will. He plans to summon Tartaros and 'reset' Earth by eradicating the current civilization of Caninu and Felineko.

9.name: Game setting and plot
9.content: Fuga: Melodies of Steel is a tactical RPG and a prequel to Tail Concerto and Solatorobo. It is set in a world ravaged by the fascist Berman Empire. The story follows a group of Caninu and Felineko children who pilot a gigantic, ancient tank called the Taranis to rescue their families who have been taken prisoner by the empire. The game is notable for its dark themes, despite the cute character designs.

10.name: Mecha in Fuga
10.content: The Taranis is a gigantic, ancient tank that is piloted by a group of children in Fuga: Melodies of Steel. The tank is a relic of an ancient, technologically advanced civilization. It is equipped with a super weapon called the 'Soul Cannon' that is capable of immense destruction. However, using the Soul Cannon comes at a great cost, as it requires the sacrifice of a crew member's life.

lorebooks.name: Sakura Wars (Sakura Taisen)
lorebooks.description: A world info file for the universe of the Sakura Wars franchise. The series is a hybrid of a dating sim and a tactical RPG, set in a fictionalized version of the Taishō period of Japan (1912-1926).
lorebooks.creator: CassandraZX

1.name: Franchise and setting overview
1.content: Sakura Wars (Sakura Taisen) is a Japanese steampunk media franchise created by Oji Hiroi and owned by Sega. The series is a cross-genre video game that combines tactical role-playing, dating sim, and visual novel elements. It is set in a fictionalized version of the Taishō period (1912-1926), which is characterized by advanced steam-powered technology. The central conflict of the series is between demonic forces and groups of women with magical abilities who pilot steam-powered mecha to combat them. These groups, known as Combat Revues, operate covertly as theatrical troupes to maintain cover. The player's actions in the dating sim portions of the game directly impact the characters' performance in battle.

2.name: Main organization
2.content: The Imperial Combat Revue (Teikoku Kagekidan) is a secret military unit established by the Japanese government to protect Tokyo from supernatural threats. The main combat unit is known as the Flower Division (Hanagumi), whose members are all young women with strong spiritual power. The group works undercover at the Grand Imperial Theater in Ginza, where they perform plays to raise the spirits of the populace and hone their own spiritual energies. The Flower Division also has a base beneath the Hanayashiki, a flower park in Tokyo's Asakusa district.

3.name: Mecha
3.content: The Koubu (or Spiricle Armor in later games) are steam-powered mecha used by the Combat Revues to fight demons. They are powered by the spiritual energy of their pilots. A key aspect of the series' mecha is that they are generally big and bulky, which the fanbase loves. Later mecha designs, like the Mugen, are more sleek and combat-oriented, which some fans dislike for being different from the original Koubu designs. The Koubu Type-2 is the most iconic mech in the series. Some of the later mechs, like the STARs from the New York Combat Revue, can transform into planes to fly.

4.name: Gameplay mechanic
4.content: The Live & Interactive Picture System (LIPS) is a core gameplay element where the player is given a time limit to choose a dialogue option. The player's choices impact their relationship with the characters, which in turn affects their combat abilities. Letting the timer run out is also considered a choice. Later games introduced variations of LIPS, such as 'Analog LIPS', which measures the intensity of a single response, and 'Double LIPS', where interactions cross between multiple characters. Skillful performances during LIPS segments raise a character's 'Trust', granting status increases and improving combat ability.

5.name: Protagonist of early games
5.content: Ichiro Ogami is a Japanese naval officer and the protagonist of the first four games in the series. He is assigned to the Imperial Combat Revue in Tokyo and later travels to Paris to train the newly formed Paris Assault Force before returning to Tokyo. He is later promoted to lieutenant junior grade.

6.name: Protagonist of later games
6.content: Shinjiro Taiga is the nephew of Ichiro Ogami and the protagonist of 'Sakura Wars: So Long, My Love'. He is sent to New York to train with the New York Combat Revue, where he is eventually promoted to captain.

7.name: Protagonist of the 2019 game
7.content: Seijuro Kamiyama is a disgraced military veteran and the protagonist of the 2019 'Sakura Wars' game. He is assigned as the captain of the new Tokyo Imperial Combat Revue's Flower Division squad, which is at risk of being closed down due to a lack of experience and talent. He must guide them through various challenges, including the Combat Revue World Games, while protecting Tokyo from a new demon threat. He is also the protagonist of 'Sakura Wars: The Animation', which is set after the events of the game.

8.name: Character from the original series
8.content: Sakura Shinguji is the main heroine of the original series. She is a shrine maiden with a cheerful personality and is the newest member of the Flower Division in the first game. She is the daughter of Kazuma Shinguji, the hero of the last demon war, and possesses a hereditary spiritual power and swordsmanship. Her uniform and Koubu are pink. She also wields the Reiken-Arataka spiritual sword.

9.name: Character from the original series
9.content: Sumire Kanzaki is a renowned actress and the heir to the Kanzaki industrial clan, which produced the Koubu. Her uniform and Koubu are purple. She is an arrogant but skilled pilot of the Flower Division. She becomes the leader of the new Tokyo Imperial Combat Revue in the 2019 game.

10.name: Character from the original series
10.content: Iris Chateaubriand is the youngest member of the original Flower Division. She is from a family of French aristocrats and possesses psychic powers that allow her to teleport. She typically wears a green gown and carries a teddy bear named Jean Paul. Her uniform and Koubu are yellow.

lorebooks.name: Fire Emblem: Echoes (Gaiden)
lorebooks.description: Basic Lore
lorebooks.creator: CassandraZX

1.name: Continent name
1.content: Valentia is a continent located west of Archanea. It was divided into two nations, Rigel and Zofia, due to the conflicting philosophies of the sibling gods, Duma and Mila. After the events of the game, it is united under Alm and Celica, and is later known as Valm.

2.name: God of Rigel
2.content: Duma is the brother of Mila and the patron god of Rigel. He and Mila were sibling gods with conflicting philosophies on how humanity should live, and their disagreements led them to divide the continent of Valentia. Duma's teachings emphasized discipline and strength, which made Rigel a strong, martial empire. However, this led to the Duma Faithful embracing dark magic and the god himself descending into madness. Duma is a divine dragon, and he is the game's final boss. After his defeat, he is buried with Mila, and a tree grows from their remains.

3.name: Goddess of Zofia
3.content: Mila is the sister of Duma and the patron god of Zofia. Her teachings were based on pleasure and luxury, which led to Zofia becoming a peaceful and prosperous nation. However, this also made its people complacent and slothful. She is a divine dragon, and her disappearance is the catalyst for Celica's journey. Mila's soul is later revealed to be sealed inside the Falchion.

4.name: Southern nation
4.content: Zofia is the southern kingdom of Valentia, founded by the goddess Mila. Under her protection, the land is fertile and the people live a life of peace and luxury. However, this abundance made the people lazy and hedonistic, leaving the nation vulnerable to internal threats and invasion from Rigel. Zofia uses blues and greens for its banners, faith, and royal attire.

5.name: Northern nation
5.content: Rigel is the northern empire of Valentia, founded by the god Duma. The land is cold and barren, forcing its people to become strong and militaristic. This emphasis on strength gave Rigel a powerful military and a sense of order, but at the expense of compassion. Rigel has a motif of lions and uses red and gold for its banners and armor. The empire is led by Emperor Rudolf, who invades Zofia at the start of the game.

6.name: One of the two protagonists
6.content: Alm is a young man from Ram Village who was raised by his grandfather, the retired knight Mycen. He leads the Deliverance, a resistance group fighting against the Rigelian invasion. Alm is revealed to be the son of Emperor Rudolf, who orchestrated the war to create a hero capable of defeating the corrupted gods. Alm is a Lord who can promote to a Hero.

7.name: One of the two protagonists
7.content: Celica is Alm's childhood friend and the exiled princess of Zofia. She has a mysterious birthmark on her hand, similar to Alm's. She leaves Ram Village and embarks on a pilgrimage to find the missing goddess Mila, believing a peaceful resolution can be found. She is a Priestess who can use both swords and magic and promotes to a Princess. She is revealed to be royalty, which is foreshadowed by her outfit containing red and gold elements, Rigel's colors.

8.name: Alm's guardian
8.content: Mycen is a retired knight who raised Alm in Ram Village. He is a powerful Gold Knight who initially refuses to fight alongside Alm but eventually aids him in the final chapter. In the prologue of 'Echoes', he acts as a 'Crutch Character' by being able to defeat most enemies with a single hit.

9.name: Emperor of Rigel
9.content: Rudolf is the Emperor of Rigel and the game's main antagonist. He is later revealed to be Alm's father. His entire invasion was a complex plan, or 'Thanatos Gambit', to find a hero strong enough to defeat the corrupted gods, a plan which required his own death at the hands of Alm. Rudolf won't attack Alm in battle.

10.name: Head of the Duma Faithful
10.content: Jedah is the High Priest of the Duma Faithful. He is a cunning villain who has taken over the church and offers souls to Duma in exchange for power. He tricks Celica and turns her into a witch before she is saved by Alm. In the final battle, Jedah can only be damaged every fourth turn in 'Gaiden' and every fourth time he is attacked in 'Echoes'.
